loans.name: Graciela Yolanda

texts.es:
Graciela Yolanda tiene 41 años de edad, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 18 y 10 años,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Graciela se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano, ademas cria pollos para la venta. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes y alimento para los pollos. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha y la venta de los pollos. Enfreta desafios como la edad y la salud. Su sueño es comprar mas terreno para seguir sembrando y comprar una casa.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los hijos.
texts.en:
Graciela Yolanda is 41 years old. She is married and lives with her two children 18 and 10, respectively. They live in the town of Chillanes in Bolivar Province. 

The name of the community bank is El Placer, and it is located in Chillanes in the San Jose del Tambo parrish. There are 24 members who work in agriculture growing plantains, rice, yucca, cocoa, soy beans, and oranges. They also raise animals.

Graciela works growing rice, corn, oranges, soy beans, and plantains. She raises chickens to sell as well. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and makes her sales at the market in Chillanes on Sundays.

The loan will be used to buy agricultural products, fertilizer, and chicken feed. The loan will help her improve her crops and her chicken sales. The . Her dream is to purchase more land, so that she can continue growing crops and eventually buy a house. 

In her free time she likes to go for walks with her children.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies, fertilizers, and chicken feed

loans.name: Sara Adelina

texts.es: Sara Adelina: de 26 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta y elavoracion de tejidos tipicos,desde hace varios años,ella nos cuenta que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos,ya que nos dice que sus ventas han aumentado considerablemente,el sueño de ella es agrandar mas sus ventas y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Sara Adelina:  26 years old, she makes and sells typical fabrics, for several years now.  She tells us that she requests this loan to purchase raw materials to make textiles, since she tells us that her sales have increased significantly.  Her dream is to increase her sales and help her family.

loans.use: buy raw materials to make textiles.

loans.name: Jenny Fernanda

texts.es:
Jenny Fernanda tiene 30 años de edad, es soltera tiene dos hijos vivew con los hijos,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Jenny  se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano, ademas cria pollos para la venta. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes y alimento para los pollos. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha y la venta de los pollos. Enfreta desafios como la edad y la salud. Su sueño es tener casa propia y compara mas terrenos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo y jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Jenny Fernanda, 30, is single and lives with her two children in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolivar. 

The lending club is called El Placer and belongs to the canton of Chillanes in the parish of San Jose del Tambo, located about 60 minutes from the office. There are 24 members in this bank who work in agriculture, planting plantains, rice, yucca, cacao, soy and oranges as well as raising animals.

Jenny plants rice, corn, oranges, soy and plantains, and she also raises chickens for sale. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and sells them in the Sunday market in Chillanes. 

The requested loan is to buy agricultural inputs, fertilizers and chicken feed. The loan will help her to improve her harvest and the sale of her chickens. She faces challenges like health and aging. Her dream is to have her own home and to buy more land.

In her free time she likes to go on vacation and to play with her children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, fertilizers and chicken feed.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
La  socia Rosa; tiene 42 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 3 hijos ; ella se dedica al comercio minorista la socia compra ropa y vende, ella tiene su local en un conocido centro comercial en la ciudad del Cusco, la socia tiene su stand de venta de ropa por temporada, ella viaja algunas veces a la ciudad de Lima donde se encuentran las fabricas de ropa y trae ropa al por mayor como jeans, polos, casacas, camisas para varones y damas; la socia también tiene su proveedor que le envía cuando ella así lo requiere, la socia en esta ocasión desea poder invertir el préstamo del crédito en la compra de un grupo de ropa al por mayor que deberá dar la primera parte a concesión para la entrega de su cargamento así lo denominan. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor.
 La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rosa belongs to the 'Solidaridad-Chachimayo' community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Rosa is 42 years old, single, and has three children.  She buys clothes and sells them retail.  She has premises in a well-known shopping center in the city of Cusco.  She has a stand where she sells seasonal clothes.  She sometimes travels to the city of Lima where the clothes factories are and buys clothes wholesale such as men's and women's jeans, polo shirts, jackets and shirts.  She also has a supplier who sends her merchandise when she needs it.  On this occasion, Rosa would like to be able to invest her loan in buying some clothes wholesale.  She must pay up front in order for them to send her the shipment.  She is requesting this loan to buy clothes wholesale.

Rosa is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying clothes wholesale

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La señora Julia es casada, vive en la ciudad de Pilar, es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad como ser arroz, fideo, azúcar y demás. Dice que lleva 15 años en este trabajo por lo que experiencia en el campo le sobra. Su marido siempre la ayuda en el negocio, ya que el atiende con ella. Posee casa propia, con las comodidades dentro del bienestar familiar, realiza sus ventas por toda la ciudad y el departamento.
Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora. Comenta que todo lo que realiza es por ayudar a su marido en los gastos de la casa, ya que la carga es compartida. Uno de sus sueños es poder tener una despensa donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, fideos, azúcar y demás para abastecerse y de esa forma cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Está muy agradecida por la oportunidad que la Fundación le da pues de obtener el crédito le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Julia is married and lives in Pilar.  She is a merchant and sells staples such as rice, pasta, sugar, and more.  She has been doing this work for 15 years and she has more than enough experience in it.  Her husband always helps her in the business by working along with her.  She has her own house with whatever is necessary for the good of her family.  She sells throughout the city and the department.

Julia is a hardworking and spirited woman.  She says that all her effort is to help her husband with household expenses since the work is shared.  One of her dreams to is have a storeroom from where she can offer her customers greater variety.

She is requesting the loan to buy rice, pasta, sugar, and more for supplies and thus be able to fulfill her customers requests.  She is grateful to the Foundation for the opportunity that they give.  The financing will be a big help.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, pasta and more to supply her business

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
La  socia Maribel; tiene 33 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 1 hijo de 2 años de edad ; La socia es comerciante minorista, la socia se dedica  a la compra y venta de ropa al por menor, la socia viaja a la ciudad e Lima a traer ropa según el cambio d estación, ella viaja y compra ropa para adultos y niños, según los clientes que tiene y según la ropa que le pidan para traer, ella trabaja mucho en este negocio y desde hace 4 años, ella en la época navideña trae juguetes para niños y novedades para el hogar también, de este modo la socia sigue construyendo su vivienda y apoyando en casa con los ingresos económicos, ella en esta ocasión desea viajar para traer ropa al por mayor para la venta  a sus clientes ropa de inviernos que en la ciudad de Lima entrara en remate. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor.
La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Maribel is a member of the "Solidaridad-Cachimayo" community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Maribel is 33 years old, lives with her partner, and has a 2-year-old child.  She buys and sells clothes retail.  She travels to Lima to buy clothes when the season changes.  She buys clothes for adults and children according to the customers she has and according to the clothes they ask her to buy.  She works hard in this business and, for the past four years, she has also been buying children's toys and household goods during the Christmas period.  In this way, Maribel is able to continue building her home and support her family by providing income. 

On this occasion, Maribel would like to travel so that she can buy clothes wholesale which she will later sell to her customers.  She will buy winter clothes which will be marked down in price in the city of Lima.  She is requesting this loan to buy clothes wholesale.

Maribel is grateful for the support that she is being given and therefore pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying clothes wholesale

loans.name: Kriss Gin

texts.es:
Kriss nació en la provincia del Cusco, tiene 29 años de edad y es soltero.  

Actualmente, Kriss vive en la misma provincia donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas, él es nutricionista y trabaja en la DIRESA (Dirección Regional de Salud), él trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde de lunes a viernes, él también tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación de comidas típicas de la región. En esta oportunidad Kriss requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo arroz, carne y verduras.

El Banco Comunal “Salud” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Kriss was born in Cusco province.  He is 29 years old and single.  He lives in the same province in which he was born and this is where he carries out his business.  He is a nutritionist and works for DIRESA (Regional Health Authority).  He works from 7.00am to 3.00pm, from Monday to Friday.  He also has a small business making typical regional dishes.  On this occasion, Kriss needs a loan to buy supplies such as rice, meat and vegetables.

The 'Salud' community bank meet once a month in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is well known as being a very touristy and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi fiesta and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, meat and vegetables

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
She is a 33-year-old woman who is single and a mother of one child who is below 15 years of age. She lives with her child in a single room below GTTC Nkwen, a quarter in Nkwen, in Mezam Division of the North West Region of Cameroon. The death of her father is something that makes her very sad each time she thinks of it. Poverty, ill health and suffering are some of the very difficult times she has gone through. She was not able to receive an adequate education due to poverty, which makes her feel very sad.

She is a trader and specializes in the sales of raw food items like beans, gari, and maize. It is from this business that she struggles to feed and provide her family with the basic necessities of life like clothing, food and basic education. She strongly believes that if she increases her stock, she will attract more customers and make more profit. Then she will be able to buy in bulk and sell items like maize to the poultry farmers in her locality. Foodstuffs are in very high demand now that the children are going back to school.

She believes this business will be of help to her community because it will increase the availability of foodstuffs in the market, which will lead to lower prices. She intends to use the profit from her loan to educate her child with other family members who are in need and to help the needy in her community.
    
She prefers a GHAPE loan because of the low interest rate on the loans, the installment repayments, and the training she receives from GHAPE before loans are disbursed.

loans.use: to purchase beans, garri, corn and maize

loans.name: Albert

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Albert; tiene 24 años de edad,  el socio es soltero y se dedica  a prestar servicio de taxi, el socio tiene un automóvil el cual está registrado en una sociedad de taxis y el trabaja diario la ruta Cusco Urubamba, el socio requiere comprar llantas nuevas para su unidad vehicular y por esta razón requiere el préstamo para la compra de 3 llantas, el socio también quiere invertir en el mantenimientos de sus vehículo para que siga trabajando  y de este modo seguir apoyando en casa y ahorrar para estudiar. El socio solicita el prestar para invertir en la compra de 3 llantas para su unidad vehicular.
El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Albert is a member of the "Solidaridad-Cachimayo" community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Albert is 24 years old, single, and provides a taxi service.  He has a vehicle which is registered with a taxi company.  He works the Cusco-Urubamba route.  Albert needs to buy new tires for his vehicle.  He needs this loan to buy three tires.  He would also like to invest in having his vehicle serviced so that he can continue working and thereby continue supporting his household and saving up so that he can study.  

Albert is grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying three tires for his vehicle

loans.name: Raul Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en L. Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Raul; tiene 34 años de edad,  el socio tiene 1 hijo de 8 años de edad; él socio se dedica al transporte, el tiene una unidad vehicular propia L. cual está en una asociación de transporte y presta el servicio de taxi desde hace 10 años, el socio requiere invertir el crédito en L. compra de llantas y el mantenimiento respectivo de sus unidad vehicular para que siga operando adecuadamente, el socio es  una persona muy trabajadora  y dedica L. mayor parte a prestar el servicio de taxi para de este modo construir su vivienda y dar mejor calidad de vida a sus familia. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en L. compra de llantas y hacer el mantenimiento de su unidad vehicular.
El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Raul is a member of the "Solidaridad-Cachimayo" community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Raul is 34 years old and has an eight-year-old child.  He works in the transport field.  He owns a vehicle which is registered with a transport association and has been providing a taxi service for ten years.  Raul needs to invest his loan in buying tires and having his vehicle serviced so that it will continue working properly.  He is a very hard-working person who spends most of his time providing a taxi service so that he can build his home and provide his family with a better quality of life.  He is requesting this loan to invest in buying tires and having his vehicle serviced.

Raul is grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying tires and to have his vehicle serviced

loans.name: Tanya Mariela

texts.es:
Tanya Mariela tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera no tiene hijos vive con los padres,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Tanya Mariela  se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano, ademas cria pollos para la venta. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes y alimento para los pollos. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha y la venta de los pollos. No enfrenta desafios importantes . Su sueño es tener casa propia y ayudare a los padres.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir con los padres.
texts.en:
Tanya Mariela is 20 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She lives with her parents in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'El Placer' community bank is located in Chillanes canton, in San José del Tambo parish, 60 minutes from our office.  The bank has 24 members who work in agriculture; growing bananas, rice, cassava, cacao, soy and oranges.  They also raise farmyard animals.

Tanya Mariela grows rice, corn, oranges, soy and bananas.  She also raises chickens to sell.  She makes her purchases in San José del Tambo and makes her sales in the Sunday street market in Chillanes.

Tanya Mariela is requesting this loan to buy farm supplies, fertilizers, and feed for her chickens.  This loan will support her in improving her harvest and selling her chickens.  She does not face any serious challenges in her work.  Her dream is to own her own home and help her parents.

In her free time, Tanya Mariela enjoys going out with her parents.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies, fertilizers, and feed for her chickens

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
El Señor Isidro es de la ciudad de Carapeguá y vive en una de las compañías. Tiene 62 años de edad y está casado hace más de  40 años con la Señora María Avelina y tienen siete hijos todos  mayores de edad.
Hace más de 30 años que el Señor Isidro se dedica a la fabricación y ventas de las tradicionales frazadas y colchas que lleva a venderlo a cuotas por la  zona de Luque, transportándose en su motocicleta. Gracias a este trabajo logró brindar una modesta casa a su familia y pudo hacerse de varias comodidades en su hogar. Él se define como un hombre trabajador y luchador.
              Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hamacas, frazadas y sábanas puesto que tiene muchos pedidos de estos productos.
texts.en:
Isidro is from the city of Carapeguá and lives in one of its hamlets. He is 62 years old and has been married to María Avelina for more than 40 years. They have seven children who are all grown. 

For more than 30 years Isidro has worked making and selling traditional blankets and bedspreads that he brings to the Luque area to sell, transporting them on his motorcycle. Thanks to this work he has been able to provide his family with a modest home and to make the home comfortable in several ways. He sees himself as a hardworking and tenacious man.  

He asks for a loan to buy hammocks, blanks, and sheets since he has many requests for these items.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, sheets, and other items for his business.

loans.name: Duo Solidario Vicion De Fe Group

texts.es: Elica, D. 38 años y tiene 4 hijos ella se dedica a la crianza y venta D. animales y tambien se dedica a la venta D. cosmeticos, ella nos cuenta que le a gustado mucho su negocio porque le gustan mucho los animales ella compra los animales pequeños y ya cuando estan grandes los venD. asi le queda un poco D. ganancia y en los ratos libres venD. cosmeticos,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. animales y compra D. cosmeticos,al igual que la siguiente socia que se dedica a la venta D. tortilleria, el sueño D. ellas es darles lo mejor a sus hijos y que tengan un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Elica is 38 years old and has four children. She breeds and sells animals, and she also sells cosmetics. She says that she likes her business a lot because she likes the animals. She buys small animals and when they are big she sells them, getting a little profit, and in her free time she sells cosmetics. She is asking for this loan to buy animals and cosmetics. Like another member who sells tortillas, these women’s dream is to give their children the best and to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy and sell animals and cosmetics.

loans.name: Antonio Francisco

texts.es:
Antonio Francisco tiene 45 años de edad, es soltero tiene dos hijo vive solo,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Antonio Francisco se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha. No enfrenta desafios importantes. Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir trabajando y ayudar a educar a los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo los domingos con los hijos.
texts.en:
Antonio Francisco is 45 years old, single, and has two children.  He lives alone in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'El Placer' community bank is located in Chillanes canton, in San José del Tambo province, 60 minutes from our office.  The bank has 24 members who work in agriculture; growing bananas, rice, cassava, cacao, soy and oranges.  They also raise farmyard animals.

Antonio Francisco grows rice, corn, oranges, soy and bananas.  He makes his purchases in San José del Tambo and makes his sales in the Sunday street market in Chillanes.

Antonio Francisco is requesting this loan to buy farm supplies and fertilizers.  This loan will support him in improving his harvest.  He does not face serious challenges in his business.  His dream is to enjoy good health so that he can continue working and helping to educate his children.

Antonio Francisco enjoys going out for walks on Sundays with his children.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Rene; él socio tiene 3 hijos de 20, 16, 11 años de edad; El socio es conviviente, y él es transportista, el socio tiene su unidad interprovincial  el socio tiene un bus, el trabaja prestando el servicio de transporte a los clientes que viajan diario por la ruta Cusco- Iscuchaka, el socio también tiene un automóvil, el cual está destinado para taxi; el socio  solicita el préstamo  para invertir  en el combustible de sus unidades y la compra de una llanta. 
El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Rene is a member of the "Solidaridad-Cachimayo" community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Rene has three children aged 20, 16 and 11.  He lives with his partner and is a transport provider.  He has a bus which he uses to travel between provinces.  He provides a transport service to customers who travel the Cusco-Iscuchaka route every day.  He also has a car which he uses to provide a taxi service.  He is requesting this loan to invest in buying fuel for his vehicles and to buy a tire.

Rene is grateful for the support that he is being given and pledges to make his repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in fuel for his vehicles and to buy a tire

loans.name: Jairo Mauricio

texts.es:
Jairo tiene 25 años vive en Urcuquí que es a una media hora de Ibarra, vive con sus padres y se describe como una persona trabajadora, emprendedora y entusiasta.

Jairo trabaja solo en la crianza de animales (pollos) empezó a trabajar en la crianza cuando dejó de estudiar porque vio la necesidad de ayudar a sus padres. Es la primera vez que le solicita créditos a  Fodemi, el mismo que será utilizado en la compra de pollos para aumentar su negocio de crianza de animales al mismo tiempo que lograría mejorar sus ventas e ingresos.

Su sueño es poder volver a la Universidad para poder acabar su carrera y luego poder tener una familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is 25 years old and lives in Urcuquí which is half an hour from Ibarra.  He lives with his parents and describes himself as a hard-working, entrepreneurial and enthusiastic person.

Jairo's sole business is raising animals (chickens).  He started raising these animals when he left his studies because he saw that he needed to help his parents.  This is the first time that he has requested a loan from Fodemi.  He will use his loan to buy chickens to increase his animal-raising business.  This will enable him to improve his sales and income.

Jairo's dream is to be able to return to University so that he can finish his degree and then start a family.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Cachimayo, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.
El socio Hector; tiene 29 años de edad,  el socio es casada; el socio tiene 2 hijos de 8, 3 años de edad; El socio es transportista, el se dedica  a manejar su automóvil, el socio trabaja prestando servicio de transporte desde hace 6 años, el socio está abocado al turismo por lo que trabaja solo con empresas turísticas en Cusco y el valle sagrado,  el socio con lo que le ingresa de sus trabajos invierte en la construcción de su vivienda y el mantenimiento de sus hogar, el socio desea dar a su familia una muy buena y justa calidad de vida por lo que día a día se dedica al trabajo; el socio requiere l crédito para invertir en la compra de repuestos nuevos para su unidad vehicular. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de repuestos para su automóvil y así siga operando.
El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "SOLIDARIDAD-CACHIMAYO" which is located in the Cachimayo district in the province of Urubamba and the Department of Cusco.

Hector, the member, is 29 years old, he is married and he has two children aged 8 and 3 years old. The member is a driver and he operates his own car, providing transport services for the past 6 years. He is dedicated to tourism, so he only works with tourist companies in Cusco and La Valle Sagrado. The member uses the income from his job to invest in the construction and maintenance of his home. He wants to provide his family with a good and fair quality of life and so he spends each day working. 

He needs the loan to invest in the purchase of new parts for his only vehicle so that he can continue to operate. He is grateful for the support and in turn he promises to be disciplined in making the loan repayments.

loans.use: to purchase parts for his car so that he can continue to operate.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Ramona Castilla

texts.es:
Ramona Castilla tiene 46 años de edad, es soltera no tiene  hijos vive sola,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Ramona se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes . El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha . Enfreta desafios como la edad y la salud. Su sueño es tener buena salud para trabajar.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a caminar por los teerenos y acompañar a los padres que estan enefermos.
texts.en:
Ramona Castilla is 46 years old. She is single and has no children. She lives alone in the Chillanes canton in the province of Bolivar.

The V.R.C. is called EL PLACER and belongs to the Chillanes canton, in the parish of San Jose del Tambo, which is located 60 minutes from the office. There are 24 members in this group who work in agriculture growing bananas, rice, cassava, cocoa, soya and oranges as well as breeding livestock.

Ramona works growing rice, corn, oranges, soya and banana. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and she sells them in the Chillanes market at the Sunday fair. 

She is asking for a loan to buy farming consumables and fertilizers. The loan will help support her in improving the harvest. She faces challenges such as old age and ill health. Her dream is to have good health in order to work.

In her free time she likes to walk the land in the company of her parents who are in ill health.

loans.use: to buy farming consumables and fertilizers.

loans.name: Cinthia Mabel

texts.es:
La Señorita Cinthia tiene 20 años de edad, es una joven emprendedora, ella es soltera, vive con sus padres Don Anselmo y Doña María, su hermano Luis de 24 años es Licenciado en Enfermería. Su familia es muy humilde y trabajadora, viven en la Ciudad de Coronel Oviedo.
Chintia es estudiante de la carrera de Administración en la Universidad Nacional, como es una joven activa emprendió su pequeño negocio que es el de realizar fotocopias y trabajos prácticos con diseños, a fin de poder ayudar a sus padres a costear su estudios. Comenta que le va muy bien con los muchos contactos que tiene en la universidad, y por más que le esfuerza, a la par que estudia, no se deja vencer porque desea progresar y llegar a todos sus objetivos, una de ellas es de ser una buena profesional.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de tintas, hojas y mantenimiento de equipo. Está muy contenta por la oportunidad que le brinda la Fundación Paraguaya al poder tener la posibilidad de obtener el crédito.
texts.en:
Cinthia is 20 years old and is an enterprising young person. She is single and lives with her parents Anselmo and María and with her brother Luis who is 24 years old and has a Bachelor’s in Nursing. Her family is humble and hardworking; they live in the city of Coronel Oviedo. 

Cinthia is a student pursuing a career in Administration at the National University. She is an busy young person who has started a small business making photocopies and work projects with graphic design in order to help her parents pay for her schooling. She says things are going very well with the many contacts she has in the university. As hard as she works, she’s studying at the same time. She will not give up because she wants to progress and to reach all of her goals, one of which is to be a successful professional. 

She asks for a loan to pay for ink, paper, and equipment maintenance. She is very happy because Fundación Paraguaya has made it possible for her to get a loan.

loans.use: to pay for ink, paper, and computer equipment maintenance

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr:
Awa est une femme âgé(e) de 28 ans. Elle est célibataire avec 01 enfant.
Awa travaille comme revendeuse de charbons de bois (un combustible très utilisé par les femmes togolaises depuis 2008. Elle achète à l’intérieur du pays et revend à domicile.
Awa est à son second  cycle de prêt à WAGES et ce prêt l’aidera à s’approvisionner en marchandises.
texts.en: Awa is a 28-year old woman. She is single with one child. She  has been working as a vendor of charcoal ( a fuel very popular with Togolese women) since 2008. She stocks up in the interior of the country and sells out of her home. Awa is on her second loan cycle with WAGES, and this loan will allow her to restock.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal

loans.name: Jesus Alexander

texts.es: El Señor Jesús  es soltero vive en la casa de su madre, se dedica hace 02 años a la prestación de servicios de transporte público en su mototaxi (modo de transporte utilizado para ir a distancias cortas con un máximo de tres pasajeros), trabaja todos los días, mañana y tarde. Los ingresos obtenidos hace posible cubrir sus gastos y necesidades personales. El crédito solicitado es para invertirlo en la compra de un par de llantas y darle una reparación general de su moto para que estén en un buen estado y pueda desempeñar su labor diaria sin dificultades. Su meta futura del Señor Jesús es comprar una mototaxi nueva para alquilarla y tener mejores ingresos, además su gran sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Jesús is single and lives in his mother’s house. For two years he has worked providing public transportation in his moto-taxi (a mode of transportation used to go short distances with a maximum of three passengers). He works ever day, morning and night. The income he receives makes it possible to cover his expenses and personal necessities. He is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of a set of tires and to give his moto-taxi an overhaul so that it will be in good condition and he can perform his daily work without difficulty. Jesús’ goal for the future is to buy a new moto-taxi to rent out and get a better income. Also, his long term goal is to have his own home.

loans.use: to buy a set of tires and give his moto-taxi an overhaul.

loans.name: Olivia Margot

texts.es:
Olivia Margot tiene 35 años de edad, es casada tiene dos hijos vive con el esposo y con los hijos,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Olivia  se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha. Enfreta desafios no muy importantes. Su sueño es tener aumentar la produccion de cacao para generar mas ingresos para la educacion de los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte con los hijos y salir de paseo por el campo.
texts.en:
Olivia Margot is 35 years old. She is married and has 2 children. She lives with her husband and children in the Chillanes canton in the province of Bolivar. 

The V.R.C. is called EL PLACER and belongs to the Chillanes canton in the parish of San Jose del Tambo which is located 60 minutes from the office. The group has 24 members who work in agriculture growing bananas, rice, cassava, cocoa, soya and oranges as well as breeding livestock.

Olivia works growing rice, corn, oranges, soya and bananas. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and sells them in the Chillanes market on Sundays at the fair.

She is asking for a loan to buy farming consumables and fertilizers. The loan will help support her in improving the harvest. The challenges she faces are not so serious. Her dream is to increase her production of cocoa to generate more income for her children's education.
 
In her free time she likes to play sports with her children and go for walks in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy farming consumables and fertilizers.

loans.name: Roy

texts.es: Roy, tiene la edad 38 de años, está casado y vive con su esposa e hijo que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el credito comprar el equipo para aserrar madera. El cuenta con varios años de experiencia en al aserrado de madera y lo que el quiere es complementar mas su herramientas para así facilitar aún mas su trabajo. El pretende con esa compra aumentar su rendimiento en el trabajo y así generar mayor ganancias para su bienestar familiar. El quiere generar suficientes ganancias  para salir con el credito y mejorar su calidad de vida en el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Roy is 38 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and son, who are his main priority. With the loan, he intends to purchase sawmilling equipment. He has several years experience in the sawmilling industry and what he wants to do is supplement the tools he already has to further facilitate his work. He wants to generate sufficient income to cover the loan and improve his future quality of life. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has never had any loans from state banks. However, FUDECOSUR has given him the loan with better facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy sawmilling equipment.

loans.name: Duo Solidario Vida Y Amor Group

texts.es: Duo Vida y amor. Sofia,siendo ella la lider de este grupo de 73 años de edad ella se dedica a la elavoracion de tejidos a mano tipicos desde hace varios años,ella esta esta solicitnaod este credito paa la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos ya que nececita mas capiral para trabajar la igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos el sueño de ellas es tener un capital mas grande y estar mejor economicamente.
texts.en: Sofia is the lead of the group Duo Vida Y Amor (Life and Love Duo). She is 73 years old, and she has been making traditional woven items by hand for some years. She is asking for this loan to buy raw material for weaving since she needs more working capital. Like another member who is asking for a loan to buy raw material for traditional weaving, these women’s dream is to have a more working capital and to be better off financially.

loans.use: to buy raw material to make traditional woven items.

loans.name: Mireya Gioconda

texts.es:
Mireya Gioconda tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera no tiene  hijos vive con los padres,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

Mireya  se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano, ademas cria pollos para la venta. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha . Enfreta desafios la competencia y la experiencia de los agricultores. Su sueño es ayudar a los padres y aumentar la produccion.

En los tiempos libres le gusta conversar con los padres y salir a conversar con las amigas del sector.
texts.en:
Mireya Gioconda is 22 years old. She is single and has no children. She lives with her parents in the Chillanes canton in the province of Bolivar.

The V.R.C is called EL PLACER and belongs to the Chillanes canton in the parish of San Jose del Tambo which is located 60 minutes from the office. This group has 24 members who work in agriculture growing bananas, rice, cassava, cocoa, soya and oranges as well as breeding livestock.

Mireya works growing rice, corn, oranges and bananas. In addition, she raises chickens to sell. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and her sales in the Chillanes market on Sundays at the fair.

She is asking for the loan to buy farming consumables and fertilizers. The loan will help support her in improving her harvest. The challenges she faces are those of competition and the experience of the other farmers. Her dream is to help her parents and increase her production.

In her free time she likes to talk with her parents and chat with friends in the area.

loans.use: to buy farming consumables and fertilizers.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis tiene 35 años vive en Urcuquí que está a media hora de Ibarra, vive con su madre, se describe como una persona alegre, trabajadora y con ganas de superarse.

Trabaja solo desde cuando tenía 17 años en la crianza de animales (pollos). Es la primera vez que le solicita créditos a Fodemi, este crédito será utilizado para la compra de pollos para aumentar su negocio lo cuál aumentará sus ventas e ingresos lo cual le puede ayudar a su mamá para que se ponga su negocio de pollos asados.

Su sueño es casarse con su novia y poder tener un galpón grande de pollos.
texts.en:
Luis is 35 years old. He lives with his mother in Urcuquí, half an hour from Ibarra. He describes himself as a happy, hardworking person who is determined to make a better life for himself.

He's worked on his own raising chickens since he was 17 years old. This is the first time he's applied for a loan from FODEMI. He will use it to buy chickens to expand his business, which will increase his sales and profits. This will make it possible for his mother to start a business selling roasted chickens.

His dream is to marry is girlfriend and have a large, thriving chicken business.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise.

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
Maria Esther tiene 49 años de edad, es soltera tiene dos hijos  vive con los hijos,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja ademas crian animales de corral.

maria se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano . Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes . El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha. Enfreta desafios como la edad y la salud. Su sueño es tener casa propia para vivier con los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta limpiar la casa y conversar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Maria Esther is 49 years old. She is unmarried and lives with her two children in the village of Chillanes in the province of Bolivar.
She is a member of the El Placer village bank in Chillanes, in the town of San Jose del Tambo. It is an hour from the main office and has 24 members who work in agriculture, either growing bananas, rice, yucca, cacao, soybeans, and oranges or raising barnyard animals.
Maria grows rice, corn, oranges, soybeans, and bananas. She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo and then sells them in the Chillanes market on Sundays.
She is requesting this loan so she can buy farming supplies and fertilizers. It will help her improve her harvest. She is facing challenges like age and poor health. Her dream is to have her own house where she can live with her children.
In her free time, she likes to do housekeeping and talk to her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Victor, tiene la edad 29 de años, está casado y vive con su esposa e hija que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el credito comprar los insumos para la asistencia del almacigo y darle una buena asistencia para asi obtener mejores resultados. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotacion de buena forma de este cultivo y ademas con la experiencia necesaria para darle un buen manejo a este. El quiere generar un almacigo de buena calidad para así satisfacer a sus compradores. El quiere darle a su familia  una mejor calidad de vida y generar los ingresos para así cumplir varios proyectos de vida establecidos por ambos.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Victor, 29 years old, is married and lives with his wife and daughter. They are his biggest priority. With this loan, he intends to buy supplies to take care of the seedbeds for his coffee plants. He has a plot of land that's perfect for this kind of growing, and he has the experience necessary for it to be a success. He wants to grow high-quality coffee to satisfy his buyers. He wants to give his family a better quality of life and bring in profits to help them fulfill some of their goals. This is the first loan he's received from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't received any prior loans from state banks, and FUDECOSUR is offering him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy materials for planting a coffee crop.

loans.name: Vilma Yaneth

texts.es: Vilma. D. 42 años D. edad y tiene 3 hijos ella se dedica a la venta D. productos comestibles D. primera nececidad,desD. hace varios años,ella tiene su tienda y en ella venD. frijol,Arroz,jabon,golocinas,etc ella nos cuenta que gracias A Dios le ha Ido bien en su negocio,y esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra D. productos comestibles D. primera nececidad,el sueño D. ella es agrandar mas su negocio y tener mas variedad en su tienda para satisfacer a sus clientes y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vilma is 42 years old and has three children. For many years she has sold basic grocery products. She has a shop where she sells beans, rice, soap, candy, etc. 

She says that thanks to God, her business does well. Vilma is asking for this loan to buy basic grocery products. Her dream is to grow her business and offer more variety in her store for her customers, and wants to give her children the best.

loans.use: to buy basic grocery products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy laying hens.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy flour, meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and other ingredients for her empanada business.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro tiene 44 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y su hijo en su casa propia. Desde hace 7 años viene radicandoen la ciudad de Huancayo, ahí labora como agricultor y transportista de mototaxi, pues le eran muy necesarias para su propia sostenibilidad. Actualmente su economía es estable, ya que debe alternas éstas dos actividades, en tiempo de siembra, se dedica al servicio de transporte, hasta que deba esperar el tiempo en que llegue la temporada de cosecha. Teodoro se siente mas seguro desarrollando ambos trabajos, por lo que ahora desea es incursionar en la ganadería, asimismo desea comprar una moto más. Es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP, decidió trabajar de esta manera para mejorar las condiciones de su actividad económica ya que le informaron de las ventajas de acceder a un crédito. Con del dinero solicitado, mejorará la cochera de deposito que tiene en su misma casa y que le sirve para guardar su mototaxi para lo cual comprará cemento y otros materiales de construcción y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en: Teodoro is 44 years old. He lives next to his wife and son in his own house. He's been living in the city of Huancayo for 7 years, where he makes a living working as an agricultural laborer and motorcycle taxi driver. He is in good financial shape at the moment, since he can alternate between his two jobs. He drives his motorcycle taxi during the planting season and works the land during the harvest season. Teodoro feels more secure with both jobs, and now he wants to try his hand at raising livestock, as well as buying an additional motorcycle. This is his first loan from MFP. He decided to request the loan in order to improve his economic circumstances after he was told about the advantages such a loan would give him. He will use the requested money to improve the garage at his house where he stores his motorcycle taxi, for which he will need to buy cement and other construction materials and pay the workers.

loans.use: to buy cement and pay construction workers.

loans.name: Mykailo

texts.en:
Mykailo is married with two children. He has owned a retail business selling bathroom equipment for 8 years. His honesty and friendly attitude attracts many customers. A large assortment allows his customers to make good choices and purchase what they need at his store. 

Mykailo would like to expand his business since it is the only source of income for his family. He is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnas to purchase additional inventory of washbasins and toilets. Mykailo hopes to make more money and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase washbasins and toilets for sale in his retail store.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La señora Verónica está casada con el señor Aristarco y con quien procreo  cinco hijos que aún están a su responsabilidad.

    Ella solicito el préstamo en la compra  de ropas para luego venderlo en la misma localidad, también comprará tela para elaborar mandiles. Esta actividad la lleva practicando hace 10 años  y comenta que le va bien ya que con ello ha tenido un buen ingreso.

    Ella se inspiro en esta actividad por que su papa le dio la idea del negocio, ya que al principio ella trabajaba junto con su papá en éste mismo negocios, pero después por si sola  comenzó a comprar las ropas y a salir a vender y así apoyarse con los ingresos de la casa.

    Lo que desea es con el préstamo es que pueda comprar más ropas de mejor calidad así las ganancias sean mejor para comprar una maquina de coser mas cómoda y costurar mas días a la semana.
texts.en:
Verónica is married to Aristarco, with whom she has five children who are still their financial responsibility.

She is requesting this loan to buy clothing to sell, and to buy cloth, which she will use to make aprons. She's made a living this way for 10 years, and she says it's going well for her and provides a good income.

She was inspired to start the business by her father, since she used to work at it with him but eventually went out on her own to buy clothing and sell it and use her earnings to support her household.

She would like to use the loan to buy higher-quality clothing so that she'll earn more, which will enable her to buy a more comfortable sewing machine and be able to sew more days a week.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La señora Virginia tiene 65 años D. edad, está casada desD. hace mucho tiempo con el señor Simeón D. 87 años D. edad, y viven en su propia casa que está situada en la ciudad D. Encarnación.
La señora Virginia es comerciante desD. hace tiempo, tiene una Despensa y Carnicería en su domicilio que es atendida por ella misma, y con la ayuda D. su familia. Comenta que tiene mucha clientela que acuD. diariamente a su local. Ella además le cuida a su marido quien ya es mayor y está en silla D. ruedas debido a una caída que tuvo. Gracias a su negocio ella pueD. salir adelante, mantener su hogar y solventar cualquier imprevisto que se le presente. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por tratar D. tener una vejez digna y decorosa.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. carne, pollos, embutidos, panificados, bebidas, artículos D. primera necesidad en general. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, pues D. obtener el crédito le será D. mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Virginia is 65 years old and has been married for a long time to Simeón who is 87 years old. They live in their own home that is located in the city of Encarnación.
Virginia has been a merchant for some time. She has a store and a butcher shop in her home that she tends herself and with the help of her family. She says that she has a lot of customers that come to her store daily. She also takes care of her husband who is already elderly and is in a wheelchair due to a fall. Thanks to her business, she is able to get ahead, maintain her home and pay for whatever unexpected expenses come up. She says that everything she does is to try to have a dignified and decent old age. She is requesting the loan to buy meat, chicken, sausages, baked breads, drinks and basic goods in general. She thanks the Foundation for the opportunity that it gives her; obtaining the loan will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, sausages, baked breads, drinks and basic goods in general.

loans.name: Jaquelin Maria

texts.es: L. Señorita Jaquelin es una mujer soltera con todas las ganas D. salir adelante, elL. emprendió su negocio hace 02 años que se dedica a L. venta D. anticuchos y parrilladas. El crédito solicitado es para invertirlo en L. compra D. algunos productos que se utiliza en L. preparación D. estas comidas (carne D. res, pollo, corazón, hígado, entre otros productos), para poder abastecer mejor a sus clientes y tener mayores ingresos. Su gran meta D. L. Señora Jaquelin es tener en el futuro su propio restaurante, además su gran sueño es el tener una casa propia. L. Señora está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado, ya que le permitirá tener una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Jaquelin is a single woman with the all the desire to get ahead. Two years ago, she started her business of selling kebabs and grilled meats. The loan is to be invested in buying some of the products that are used in the food preparation (beef, chicken, heart, and liver among other products) in order to better cater to the demands of her customers and have greater income. Jaquelin’s biggest goal is to have her own restaurant in the future and her biggest dream is to have her own home. She is very grateful for the loan given, since it will allow her to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products that will be used in the preparation of kebabs and grilled meats (beef, chicken, heart, liver)

loans.name: Duo Mujeres De Chuarrancho Group

texts.es:
MUJERES DE CHUARRANCHO
Este grupo está formado por Olga, soltera que se dedica al tejido de güipiles y cortes,siendo ella la lider de este grupo esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra de materia perima para la confeccion de tejidos como cortes tipicos y fajas también esta María Elena soltera, y se dedica desde hace 25 años al tejido de fajas, cortes, y güipiles están solicitando este nuevo crédito esperando que se les pueda apoyar ya que gracias a fape pudieron invertir el crédito anterior en material para su trabajo ahora necesitan nuevamente crédito porque  les ha ido bien y tienen más demanda además tienen entrega fija con un nuevo proveedor, entonces necesitan comprar más material así les sale más bajo el costo y pueden obtener ganancias confían que se les pueda apoyar nuevamente y a la vez agradecen el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mujeres de Chuarrancho (Women of Chuarrancho) was formed by Olga who is single. She weaves blouses and skirts. She is the leader of this group. She is asking for this loan to buy raw material to make woven items like traditional skirts and belts. There is also María Elena who is single. She has worked for more than 25 years weaving belts, skirts, and blouses. They are asking for a new loan hoping that it will be able to help them since, thanks to FAPE, they were able to invest their last loan in material for their work. Now they need a new loan because things have been going well and they have had more demand. Also, they have a fixed delivery with a new supplier. So they need to buy more material so they can get a lower price and a profit. They are confident that the loan can help them again, and right now they are thankful for the opportunity.

loans.use: to buy raw material for weaving

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
El señor Felipe, vive en un barrio donde se celebra una gran fiesta el 25 de abril. 
Él es casado con la señora  María Luisa  y con quien procero seis hijos quienes ya cinco ya están casados y una está a su responsabilidad.

    El es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo en fundación y es para invertirlo en la compra  y venta de ropas, para damas, cabellarlo, niños y niñas, para luego llevarlo  a vender en las comunidades cercanas de su localidad, en esta actividad lleva treinta años en la que cometa que le  va muy bien ya que con ellos a sacado adelante  a su familia.

  Su inspiración por esta actividad,  comenzó ya que  necesitaba un trabajo el cual le dejara  ingresos y así poder solventar algunos gastos que se generan en su  hogar y gracias adiós lo ha logrado.

     Lo que más desea es que con ello pueda  seguir trabajando ya si   seguirá delante hasta que dios le preste vida.
texts.en:
Señor Felipe lives in a neighbourhood which celebrates a great festival on 25 April. He is married to Señora María Luisa with whom he has 6 children, 5 of whom are already married, which leaves one under his care.

This is the first time that he asks the Fundación for a loan and he will invest it in buying and selling clothes for ladies, mens, boys and girls. He will sell the clothes later in the nearby communities of his area. He has been doing this work for 30 years and says that he is doing well as in doing so he has managed to raise his family.

He was inspired to get involved in this work as he needed a job that would give him an income with which he could cover some of his household expenses and which "gracias a dios" (thanks be to God) he suceeded in doing.

What he most wants is that he can continue in this line of work for he will continue to go forwards "hasta que dios le preste vida" (for as long as God gives him life).

loans.use: to buy clothes which he will later sell.

loans.name: Maria Minerva

texts.es:
La señora   María Minerva, es casada con el señor   Francisco y con quien procreo un hijo de la edad de  un año tres meses.

    Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de abarrotes ya que va a poner una tienda de abarrotes para apoyarse con los ingresos de la casa, como  también a su esposo quien trabaja en el campo.

    Esta inspiración comenzó por si sola para poder solventar sus gastos generados, así tener de done  trabajar y obtener mejor calidad de vida.

    Su  más grande deseo es que con el préstamo pueda obtener sus mercancías para  comenzar  instalar  su negocio.
texts.en:
Sra. María Minerva is married to Francisco and they have one son who is three months old. She is requesting a loan to buy groceries because she is going to set up a grocery story to help earn household income and help her husband who works in the fields.

She, herself, was inspired to do this because she wants to be able to help pay their expenses and have a place to work, thereby obtaining a better quality of life. Her greatest wish is to use the loan to buy merchandise so she can begin setting up her store.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase of merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es: Ignacio, tiene la edad 22 de años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos. El pretende con el credito compra los medicamentos e insumos para el cuido de ellos. El cuenta con los establecimientos adecuados par la explotacion de estos animales  y con la experincia para faciltar todas la labores que se necesitan paran el proyecto. El quiere tener el alimento necesario para aplicarle a sus cerdos y los medicamentos por si los animales se enferman. El quiere darle un buen cuido a sus animales y así poder venderlos de buena calidad al mercado y así generar las meyores ganancias y poder ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y poder ayudar a sus padres con las responsabilidades del hogar.Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ignacio, age 22, is single and lives with his parents and siblings.  

He has the appropriate facilities for working with these animals.  He also has the experience to facilitate all of the work needed for this business activity.  He intends to use the loan for medication and supplies to take care of them.  He wants to have the feed that is needed for his pigs, and he wants to have medicine in case the animals get sick.

He wants to provide good care for his animals.  That way they will be of good quality, and he will able to sell them at the market.  This is the way he will generate greater income and be able to offer his family a better quality of life.  He will also be able to help his parents with the household responsibilities.

This is the first loan he has had with FUDECOSER.  He has had no prior loan with state banks.  FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina is married with one daughter. She has a business selling women’s clothing in several markets of Kahovka and the Kherson region for 8 years.  Currently, she has over 23,500 Grivnas in turnover capital. Her net profit is about 4,500 Grivnas a month. 

Valentina is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnas to increase inventory in her kiosks. She is hoping to increase sales and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her women's clothing business.

loans.name: Duo Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: Duo Bendicion D. Dios: Este duo esta integrado por doña Marta Olivia D. 48 años D. edad y tiene dos hijos,ella se dedica a la venta D. telas para confeccionar prendas D. vestir, ella nos cuenta que esta contenta porque sus ventas han aumentado y por eso esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra D. telas para confeccionar prendas D. vestir.al igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitnaod este credito para la compra D. telas ya que ella se dedica a la confeccion D. prendas D. vestir.
texts.en: Duo Bendicion D. Dios (God’s Blessing Duo) was formed by Marta Olivia who is 48 years old and has two children. She sells fabric to make clothes. She says that she’s happy because her sales have increased and for that reason she is asking for this loan to buy fabric to make clothes like the other group member who is asking for a loan to buy fabric since she makes clothes.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make clothes

loans.name: Olga

texts.en:
Olga is married and has a 4-year-old son. She sells women’s clothing at Krytiy market in Zaporozhye city. Olga started this business five years ago with the help of her mother who is also a market vendor. She purchased the initial inventory for Olga. 

Today, Olga attracts her clients with the quality and variety of her inventory and she would like to expand her business. Olga is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnas to purchase women’s coats. She hopes to increase her sales and income to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase women’s coats to sell in the market.

loans.name: Corazon De Chocolate Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CORAZON DE CHOCOLATE” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Remy. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de gelatina y frescos, pintura en tela y goma eva, perfumes, tienda de barrio, puesto de tucumanas, venta de videos educativos, venta de juguetes.

La señora Remy,  indica que es la primera ves que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por medio de un anuncio (volantes). En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio producción de artesanías en tela y de goma eva.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de pintura y goma eva), que comprara de la Huyustus  y lo venderá a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “Corazón de Chocolate” (Chocolate Heart) Communal Bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Santiago II Community Center.  The group is comprised of eight members, and it is led by a governing board that is headed by Remy.  The members’ businesses are varied.  Among our businesses we have selling gelatin and soft drinks, painting on fabric and vinyl, perfumes, neighborhood store, a “tucumanas” (fried turnovers) stand, selling educational videos, and selling toys.

Remy points out that this is her first time working with Pro Mujer.  She joined by way of an advertisement (flyer).  She currently has a business producing handicrafts in fabric and vinyl.  This loan is to increase her capital (to buy paint and vinyl).  She will make her purchases in Huyustus, and she will sell them by order.

This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy paint for fabric and vinyl.

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: La Sra. santusa vive en la localidad D. la Guardia, hace unos 25 años que se vino a vivir a dicha localidad, su esposo es D. ocupación albañil el se dedica hace unos 40 años a esta actividad, tienen dos hijos a su cargo ya que tres D. sus hijos son independientes, los cuales le colaboran en su economía, su actividad principal es la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad, es decir venta D.  barrio, en su propio domicilio, y también venD. en la puerta D. un  colegio D. la zona por donD. vive hace unos seis años que se dedica a este negocio, el destino del crédito es para aumentar su capital D. trabajo, como ser la compra D. : arroz, aceite, harina, dulces, galletas, sodas, etc., se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo financiero que se le brinda, por lo tanto así han podido salir adelante y D. esta manera mejorar su economía y por enD. su calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Santusa lives in the town of La Guardia.  She came to live in this area 25 years ago.  Her husband is a bricklayer and has been in that profession for about 40 years.  They have two dependent children since three are now on their own.  Their children help them with their finances.  Her main business is selling essential items.  In other words, she sells in her neighborhood from her own home and she also sells at the door of a local school.  She has been in this business for about six years.  This loan is intended to increase her working capital, allowing her to buy things such as rice, oil, flour, candy, cookies, sodas, etc.  She thanks the institution for the financial support they offer her, which has allowed her to get ahead by improving her finances and, as a result, her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, oil, flour, and cookies to stock her store

loans.name: Trabajadoras De Señor De La Cruz Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “TRABAJADORAS DE SEÑOR DE LA CRUZ” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Berta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tejido de chompas, elaboración de mantas, costura de deportivos, tejido de buzos de lana, venta de verduras, confesión de faldas, venta de ropa.

La señora Berta, indica que seis meses que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una compañera. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de mantas que viene trabajando hace tres años atrás aprendiendo el mismo de una hermana.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de la feria 16 de julio y la calle Tumusla y que posterior a la elaboración lo comercializará en las en el desaguadero. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The Trabajadoras de Señor de La Cruz Communal Bank will start its second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes community center.  The group is comprised of eight members, and it is run by a governing board, which Berta heads.  The businesses of the members are varied.  Among the businesses is knitting sweaters, making blankets, sportswear, knitting wool sweatshirts, making skirts, and selling clothes.

Berta says that she has worked with Pro Mujer for six months.  She joined the group by invitation from a friend.  She currently has a business weaving blankets.  She has been doing this work for three years; she learned from her sister.

The loan she will get now is to increase her capital (to buy wool).  She will get the wool at the 16 de Julio Fair and Tumusla street.

 After she makes them she sells them in Desaguader.  This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Mykola

texts.en:
Mykola is married with grown-up children. He owns a small business selling clothing and shoes, as well as seeds and fertilizers, in seven small towns in Nova Kahovka area. 

Mykola started this business five years ago. Today he's got many repeat clients. Mykola goes to each place once a week to bring his inventory. He also takes individual orders from people and brings them what they ask for.

Mykola is requesting a loan of 20,000 Grivnas to increase assorted inventory. He is hoping to make additional profit and use it to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase assorted inventory

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: La señora Norma,   es una clienta antigua  de la institución, que demostró un trato amable y Cortez en la evaluación, la cliente vive en la zona de Villa Esperanza de la cuidad de el alto, La Paz-Bolivia (zona norte), la Sra. Norma vive con sus dos pequeños hijos a quienes dedica su atención y amor de madre. Cuenta con la ayuda de su mamá para el cuidado de ellos cuando tiene que salir a la venta de la comida que prepara con esmero y una buena sazón, el esposo por razones de trabajo se encuentra en el interior en Santa Cruz, quien manda por giro bancario dinero para apoyar así a su familia.  La Sra. Norma es muy trabajadora y además abnegada con sus hijos, ella tiene la voluntad de que con trabajo lograra que sus hijos tengan un futuro mejor y pueda costear sus estudios profesionales, por lo que se esfuerza a lograrlo día a día en su afanosa labor, con el dinero del crédito comprara material de construcción para hacer construir su vivienda y así brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Norma is a longtime client of the institution, where she found the staff friendly and courteous during her assessment.  She lives in the Villa Esperanza area of the city of El Alto, near La Paz, in the northern part of Bolivia.

Norma lives with her 2 small children to whom she devotes her care and love as a mother.  Her mother helps her look after them, when she goes out to sell the carefully made and flavorful food that she prepares.  

Due to his work, her husband is in the interior in Santa Cruz department, and he sends money via bank transfer to support his family. 

Norma is very hard-working and self-sacrificing when it comes to her children.  Her wish is that with her work she will succeed in helping her children have a better future and be able to afford their professional studies. This why she works hard to achieve this day by day, and is so industrious. 

She will use the loan to buy construction materials to have a house built, in order to provide greater comfort for her family.

loans.use: To build a house.

loans.name: Soñadores Con Proposito 3, 6 & 7 Group

texts.en:
Margarita is the coordinator of her group "Soñadores con Proposito" (Dreamer with a purpose) 3, 6 & 7. This group is located in the city of El Seybo, one of the most agricultural and rural cities in the Dominican Republic. The borrowers run their businesses in the communities near the city. They sell clothes, shoes, grocery store items and others.

Margarita makes her home here in a simple house with her long-term partner and four children. She is running a clothing store where she sells all kinds of men's and women's clothes. She will use this loan to increase her inventory. She is excited to be taking out her 10th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business.

This Esperanza associate began with us because she needed capital to invest in her business. After some loans, Margarita's business has been improving with every investment, and she uses the profits to reinvest in her business and to save. She thanks you all for your support!

loans.use: To buy clothing.

loans.name: Daniela Estefania

texts.es:
Daniela Estefania tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera no tiene hijos vive con los padres,  en el Canton Chillanes Provincia de Bolivar.

La V.R.C se llama EL PLACER perteneciente al Canton Chillanes parroquia San Jose del Tambo esta ubicada a 60 minutos de la oficina, en esta ventanilla hay 24 socios que se dedican a la agricultura a la siembra de Platano, arroz, yuca, cacao, soya y naranja.

Daniela  se dedica a la siembra de arroz, maiz, naranja, soya y platano. Las compras las realiza en San Jose del Tambo y las Vende en el mercado de Chillanes los domingos en la feria.

El credito lo solicita para comprar de insumos agricolas y fertilizantes. El credito le ayudara como apoyo para mejorar la cosecha . Enfreta desafios como la experiencia de los productores. Su sueño es tener casa propia y terminar los estudios.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir con los padres y conversar con las amigas del barrio.
texts.en:
Daniela Estefania is 18 years old.  She is single, and has no children.  She lives with her parents in the Chillanes canton, in Bolivar province.

The "EL PLACER" community bank is in the Chillanes canton, in the San Jose del Tambo province.  It is located 60 minutes from the main office.  This community bank has 24 members who work in agriculture growing plantains, rice, yucca, cocoa, soy and oranges.

Daniela works growing rice, corn, oranges, soy and plantains.  She makes her purchases in San Jose del Tambo, and makes her sales in the Chillanes market on Sundays.

The loan she is requesting is to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers.  The loan will help her by helping to improve her harvest.  She faces challenges such as the other producers' experience.  Her dream is to have her own home and to finish her studies.

In her free time, she likes to go out with her parents and chat with her neighborhood friends.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizers.

loans.name: Cristhian Josué

texts.es: Cristhian está estudiando una maestría en gerencia, por lo que se está volviendo para él una laptop que le permita desarrollar y organizar los conocimientos adquiridos en la maestría. El actualmente está pagando la maestría con el esfuerzo de su trabajo. Su sueño es llegar a desarrollar sus conocimientos en una empresa nicaraguense. Sus padres hace algún tiempo perdieron sus negocio en un incendio y es lo obligó a buscar trabajo para servirles de apoyo a ellos. Trata de vencer todos sus obstáculos con madurez y eso lo hace más fuerte para cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Cristhian is studying for a Master's degree in Management, which is why he wants a laptop which will allow him to develop and organize the knowledge he is acquiring through his Master's.  

He is currently paying for his Master's by working.  His dream is to develop his knowledge with a Nicaraguan business.

His parents lost their business in a fire some time ago, and so he had to look for work to be able to provide his parents with support.

He tries to overcome all the obstacles he faces with maturity, and this gives him strength for accomplishing his goals.

loans.use: to buy a laptop for his Master's degree studies.

loans.name: María Martha

texts.es:
María tiene 42 años es casada y tiene 5 hijos, vive con su familia en Urcuquí que está a media hora de Ibarra en el norte de Ecuador. María se describe como una persona trabajadora y luchadora.

Trabaja con un hijo en su tienda,ya son tres años que trabaja con Fodemi y el crédito que solicita actualmente es para la compra de víveres para abastecer su tienda y también para la compra de una cocina industrial ya que quiere obtener más ingresos con un negocio de salchipapas.
