She also works in agriculture and cattle, which gives her additional income. This is her tenth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. In all this time she has shown herself to be punctual in her repayments and she stands out for her responsibility in making her repayments. She will use the money she is requesting this time to buy merchandise for her store and increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store

loans.name: Ermina Marilin

texts.es:
ErM. de 28 años, es una mujer trabajadora que es vendedora informal de artículos de hogar en diferentes calles de Guayaquil. Comenzó sola trabajando para poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares ya que tienen 4 hijos. Poco a poco fue incrementando la mercadería y su capital de trabajo. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar su mercadería con mas artículos de hogar como ollas, planchas, vajillas con el préstamo. En el futuro tiene proyectado mejorar su hogar y darle una mejor economía a sus hijos y así poder terminar de construir la casa.
texts.en:
ErM. is 28 years old. She is a hardworking woman and she is an informal seller of items for the home in different streets in Guayaquil. She started working in order to help her husband with the family expenses since they have 4 children. Little by little she has been increasing her merchandise and her working capital. 

She has many ambitions for her business, so she wants to improve her merchandise with more articles for the home, such as cooking pots, irons, and dish sets. For the future she plans to improve her house and provide her children with a better family economy and finish building her house.

loans.use: to buy cooking pots, irons, and dish sets

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam tiene 44 años, es separada, radica en su tierra natal al lado de sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Tiene 20 años de experiencia en la crianza de ganado vacuno de las cuales vende la leche de sus vacas así como también los becerros machos. Su trabajo diario comienza en horas de la madrugada, que consiste en cortar la alfalfa para alimentar a sus animales, limpiar su establo, ordeñar y todo el día darle esos cuidados esenciales de las cuales influye bastante en las ganancias. Su negocio es ventajoso, vende de manera diaria la leche y eso le permite ganar todos los días y  con ello afrontar cuentas de urgencia. De manera paralela tiene terrenos de cultivo en las cuales siembra  papa y maíz y que luego son vendidos una vez cosechados. Esta es la décima vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP y disfruta de ser parte de su grupo solidario porque ya conoce y tiene trayectoria en este tipo de crédito a la cual supo mirar las ventajas y beneficiarse de ellas. La mitad del dinero servirá para que compre una ternera hembra y con la otra mitad comprará saco de abono para su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Miriam is 44 years old.  She is separated and lives in her hometown with her three children in her own home.  She has 20 years of experience in raising cattle, selling cows milk, and also selling young bulls.  Her work begins at daybreak, which consists of cutting up alfalfa feed for her livestock, cleaning their stables, and taking care of the daily details that have an enormous influence on her earnings.  Her business is very advantageous.  She sells her milk in the morning daily, which allows her to earn money every day and cover all of her urgent costs.  She also has plots of land where she grows corn and potatoes, which she harvests and then sells.  This is her tenth time seeking a loan with MFP.  She enjoys being a part of such a supportive group and she already understands the trajectory of this type of credit with has allowed her to see how they may benefit her.  Half of the money will be used to purchase a female calf and the other half will be used to purchase sacks of fertilizer for her next harvest.

loans.use: purchase calves and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Tania De Los Angeles

texts.es: Tania De Los Ángeles tiene 30 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de cyber y  video juegos. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio, comenzó con dos televisores, pero fue con el esfuerzo de su Mama que también la apoya con este negocio que han ampliado sus servicios. Ella atiende desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, siempre se preocupa por brindar un buen servicio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de televisores, PlayStation, controles, juegos entre otros.
texts.en: Tania De Los Ángeles is 30 years old.  Her main form of employment is in the cyber and video game service.  She has had this business for over four years.  She began with two televisions but with the help of her mother, who also helps her with this business, they were able to increase their offerings.  Tania manages the store from 8am until 9pm, always ready to offer the best possible service.  She is seeking a loan in order to purchase more televisions, Play Stations, controls, and video games.

loans.use: purchase televisions, Play Stations, controls, and video games.

loans.name: Las Palmas Km 14  Portoviejo Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Palmas KM 14 se reúne cada quince días en el  en el sitio D. mismo nombre D. Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

Este es un grupo de personas que hace 4 meses atrás decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les ha servido  de mucho ya que con los créditos ellas han podido mejorar sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora Ruth, es socia fundadora D. Banco comunal y le gusta por la facilidad para conseguir los créditos. Tiene 49 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene 4 hijos, tres de ellos ya son mayores de edad y el menor de 7 años el mismo que estudia en escuela. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que lo da todo por su hogar y por sus hijos, ella para ayudar a su marido con los gastos que genera el hogar se dedica a la venta de zapatos y sandalias por catálogo, trabaja cuatro días de la semana y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta pues ella visita a sus clientes en estos días mas que todo por las tardes cuando está desocupada, nos cuenta que ya lleva dos años dedicada a esta actividad y le ha ido muy bien ya que tiene bastantes clientes.

Este crédito es para comprar zapatos y sandalias ya que tiene varios pedidos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y en el banco comunal.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank, Las Palmas KM 14, meets every fifteen days in the Canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its arts and crafts which are nationally and internationally recognized.  They are also known for their famous Panama-style hats.

Four months ago, these members decided to organize and form a communal bank.  The credit that they have been able to receive has helped them improve their small businesses.  All of the members work in diverse areas, such as business, services, food sales.

One of the members of this group is Ms. Ruth.  She is one of the founding members of the communal bank and likes it very much because she can easily obtain loans.  She is 49 years old and has 4 children, three of whom are adults and one of whom is a minor of seven years old who attends school.  Her husband is a business man.

She is a very good house wife who gives her all to her home and to her children.  In order to help her husband with their household costs, she works in the sale of shoes and sandals by catalog.  She works four days a week and sells them door to door, mainly visiting her clients in the afternoon.  She has been doing this for over two years and states that is has been going very well, as she has numerous customers.

This loan will be used to purchase shoes and sandals, since she already has many orders.

Her dreams are to expand her business and the communal bank.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Ana Reyna

texts.es:
La señora Ana, de 62 años de edad es originaria de Granada, esta casada, madre de 4 hijos, ella es comerciante, se dedica a la venta y elaboración de vestido para niñas. Inicio con una maquina que compro por su cuenta cuando dejo de trabajar  como domestica para independizarse y dedicarse tiempo sus hijos busco la manera de poder salir adelante con un negocio propio que le permitiera generar ingresos al mismo tiempo poder criar a sus hijos. Ya  tiene 40 años de dedicarse a este negocio , ella vende sus productos en Matagalpa, Nueva Segovia, Jinotepe y Managua .  
Solicito el préstamo para comprar materia prima tales como hilo, agujas, tela, encajes, botones para elaborar vestidos para niñas. Con esta inversión podrá adquirir materia prima mas fácilmente, poder cumplir con los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, hacer mas vestidos y mejorar sus ingresos. Ella desea poder vender sus diseños fuera de Nicaragua, tiene como meta próxima comprar 2 maquinas nuevas de coser para elaborar mas vestidos.
texts.en: Ms. Ana is 62 years old and originally from Granada, Nicaragua.  She is married and a mother of four children.  She is a business woman, dedicated to the sale and fabrication of girls' dresses.  She began with a sewing machine that she bought with her own savings when she quit her job as a housemaid in order to become independent and dedicate her time to her children.  She wanted a job that would allow her to make money while being able to care for her children.  She has since spent 40 years working in this business.  She sells her dresses in Matagalpa, Nueva Segovia, Jinotepe, and Managua.  She is seeking a loan in order to purchase prime materials, such as thread, needles, fabric, lace, and buttons with which to make girls' dresses.  With this investment, she will be able to acquire these materials more easily, fulfill the orders that her clients have made, make more dresses, and improve her earnings.  She hopes to be able to sell her designs outside of Nicaragua.  Her next goal is to purchase two new sewing machines to be able to make even more dresses.

loans.use: purchase prime materials such as thread, needles, fabric, lace, and buttons to make girls' dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase iron for his workshop.

loans.name: Juana Del Socorro

texts.es: Juana Del Socorro tiene 47 años, su actividad es la venta de refrescos y una pequeña pulpería. Hace más de5 años que tiene esta actividad económica, la mayoría de sus clientes llegan en busca de los diferentes refrescos que ofrece. Es por eso que solicita es para la compra de frutas, bolsas, pajillas, azúcar entre otros productos necesarios.
texts.en: Juana del Socorro is 47 years old. She sells beverages and has a small store. She has been doing this work for 5 years and notes that the majority of her customers come to buy the various kinds of soft drinks she offers. Consequently, she is requesting a loan to buy fruit, bags, straws, and sugar among other necessary products.

loans.use: to buy fruit, bags, straws, sugar and other necessary products.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor tiene 45 años , actualmente vive al lado de su pareja y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. desde su niñez se dedica a las tareas agrícolas, por lo que tiene 25 años de experiencia en este trabajo. Por otro lado se dedica también a la ganadería, por lo que posee tiene en su establo de 9 cabezas de ganado entre toros, vacas, que son vendidos en la feria ganadera, asimismo vende la leche que ordeña. Al mismo tiempo, también cultiva pastos, que le sirve de forraje a sus animales, de la misma forma siembra arveja, papa y zanahoria, productos que son vendidos en el mercado local. Para Víctor, trabajar de esta manera le es muy ventajosos ya que esta a lado de los que más quiere, su pareja y sus hijos que son su razón y esfuerzo. Desea para el futuro mejorar su economía, por lo que se ha planteado tener más cabezas de reses. Es el décimo crédito que tiene con MFP, para el es una gran apoyo financiero el acceder a un crédito, ya que ha sabido darle un adecuado uso. En esta oportunidad con el dinero que solicita, comprará una vaca.
texts.en:
Victor is 45 and currently lives with his partner and 2 sons in their own house. Since childhood he has worked in agriculture, so he has 25 years of experience in this area. In addition, he also works as a cattleman and has a herd of 9 heads of cattle, among which there are bulls and cows, which he sells at the cattle fair, as well as selling milk, on order. At the same time, he also cultivates pasture lands that serve both as forage for his animals and that he also plants in green peas, potatoes and carrots, products that he sells in the local market. For Victor, working in this way is very gratifying to him because he works beside those he loves most; his partner and his sons, who are the reason for all of his efforts.

Victor wants to improve his economic status in the future and to do so he plans to have more heads of cattle. This is the tenth loan he has had from MFP, which has been a great funding source, providing him with loans that he has known how to use effectively. With this loan he will take the opportunity to buy a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Honorata

texts.es:
La señora Honorata de 43 años de edad vive con su esposo y con su único hijo que tiene 15 años, la señora tiene su propio negocio en su casa que se dedica a la venta de abarrotes (arroz, fideo, leche, aceite), bebidas (gaseosas) y golosinas. 
Con el fin de expandir su negocio, la Sra. Honorata ha solicitado un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de más mercadería (abarrotes, bebidas y golosinas) para abastecer mejor su negocio.  Su gran objetivo es que su negocio crezca y tengan mejores ingresos para así tener una mejor calidad de vida. El Sueño de la Señora Honorata es construir la segunda planta de su casa (segundo piso), está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado ya que le servirá para lograr sus objetivos trazados.
texts.en: Mrs. Honorata is 43 years old and lives with her husband and their only child, a son, who is 15 years old.  She has her own business in her home selling groceries (rice, noodles, milk, oil) and beverages (soft drinks) and sweets.  With a goal of expanding her business, Honorata has asked for a loan to invest in the purchase of more merchandise (groceries, beverages, and sweets) to better stock her business.  Her main goal is to grow her business and to have better earnings to have a better quality of life.  Her dream is to build a second floor on her home.  She is very thankful for the loan as it will help her meet her goals.

loans.use: buy more merchandise (groceries, beverages, and sweets) to better stock her business

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José, 53 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Granada esta casado, padre de 4 hijos, el es comerciante, el vende queso tiene 7 años tener este negocio. Anteriormente ya tenia experiencia en el comercio trabajando junto con su esposa, pero decidieron dedicarse a vender un producto de consumo diario, el vende el mercado municipal de la ciudad de Granada y además ese lugar es buen punto para su venta de queso, fue con este negocio que ha ayudado a mantener a su familia y sus hijos con sus estudios. 
Solicita el crédito para compra inventario de queso. Esta inversión le ayudara a poder adquirir inventario más fácilmente y la oportunidad de ofrecer mayor cantidad de queso, satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes en diferentes lugares, mejorar sus ingresos. El desea vender más producto derivados de la leche como crema, yogurt, quesillos y cuajadas. Esta es parte de su  meta y ampliar más su negocio.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old. He is from the city of Granada, married, and the father of 4 children. He is a merchant. He sells cheese and has been working in this business for 7 years. Prior to this he already had experience in sales, working together with his wife, but they decided to sell a product of daily use. He sells in the market in the city of Granada, which is a good place to sell cheese. It is with this business that he has helped to provide for his family and help his children with their studies.

He is requesting a loan to buy more cheese inventory. This investment will help him to buy inventory more easily and he’ll have the opportunity to offer a greater quantity of cheese, satisfy the demand of clients in different places, and improve his income. He wants to sell more dairy products, such as cream, yogurt, quesillo cheese, and cheese curds. This is part of his goal to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy more cheese inventory

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.es: Ermelinda tiene 31 años, vive con su esposo y su hijo en una casa que actualmente cuida. Tiene 8 años de experiencia en la realización de bellos bordados artesanales, su arte para esta clase de trabajo hacen que su desempeño sea impecable y esto siempre lo demuestra en cada trabajo que le encomiendan sus clientes. Tiene mayores pedidos cuando son épocas festivas, sobre todo los meses de julio y agosto, cuando se celebran festividades en la zona, una de ella las fiestas de Santiago. Para Ermelinda esta es una gran oportunidad de trabajo, que además le permite estar cuidando a su pequeño hijo y por ser rentable ha decidió implementarse con más insumos. Esta es la quinta oportunidad en la cual esta solicitando un crédito y manifiesta que ha sido una de las mejores, para mejorar su economía. Ahora, con este dinero estará destinado en la compra de insumos principales que comprará al por mayor como telas e hilos de colores.
texts.en: Ermelinda is 31 years old. She lives with her husband and her son in a house she is taking care of. She has 8 years of experience making beautiful hand-made embroideries. Her artfulness makes her work impeccable and this is always shown in each job that her clients commission from her. She has more requests around holiday times, especially in the months of July and August when festivals are celebrated in the area, one of which is the festival of Santiago. For Ermelinda, this is a great opportunity for work, which also allows her to care for her small son. In order to increase her profits, she has decided to have more materials on hand. This is the fifth time she has requested and loan and she says this has been one of the best opportunities to improve her income. With this money she will buy important materials at whole sale price, such as fabrics and colored threads.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and colored threads

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ando Andrew

texts.es:
Ando, de 34 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de  Granada esta casado, tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 3 años respectivamente, el es dueño de un Gym, también trabaja como entrenador, también estudio un curso de contabilidad, pero actualmente trabaja en su gimnasio. El inicio este negocio con el apoyo de un amigo, que lo incentivo a crear su propio  ya que por su anterior trabajo en Managua permanecía fuera de su casa todo el día, y tenia que pagar a alguien para que le cuidara su negocio pero después el renuncio a su trabajo en Managua y se hizo cargo por completo de su gimnasio el cual se ha convertido en su medio de subsistencia. 
El solicito el préstamo para la compra de dos maquinas de hacer ejercicios, quiere unos bancos para pesas inclinadas y declinada. Con esta inversión podrá ofrecer  mejor infraestructura de maquinas para hacer ejercicios un poco mas modernas, atraer mas clientes. En sus planes futuros  le gustaría poner un kiosko donde pueda ofrecer batidos y bebidas.
texts.en: Ando, age 34 and from the city of Granada, is married and has two children, ages 7 and 3.  He's the owner of a gym and also works as a trainer.  He has taken an accounting course, but currently works in his gym.  He started this business with the support of a friend, who encouraged him to create his own, since in his previous job in Managua he stayed away from his home all day and had to pay someone to manage his business. Then later, he resigned from his job in Managua and took complete control of his business, which has become his means of subsistence.  He requested the loan to purchase two exercise machines - he wants some incline and decline benches.  With this investment, he will be able to provide better, more modern exercise equipment, attracting more customers.  In his future plans, he would like to put in a kiosk where he could offer smoothies and other beverages.

loans.use: to purchase two exercise machines - some incline and decline benches.

loans.name: Guardianas De La Fé Cuenca Group

texts.es:
El Banco comunal Guardianas de la Fe está formado por 4 mujeres y 4 hombres quienes viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como la Santa Ana de los 4 ríos, obteniendo este nombre gracias a sus ríos que la bañan. Esta ciudad es muy culta y tiene variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es amable y carismática como nuestras socias y socios, quienes laboran en  diferentes actividades las mismas que les permiten aportar económicamente a sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias.

Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Señora. Blanca, vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene  45 años, es  casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos, tres de ellos son casados e independientes, su hijo de 19 años está haciendo el servicio militar y de allí ira a la universidad y su hijo de 6 años estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como panadero en su propio local, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Blanca se dedica a la venta de comida, esta actividad en la realiza desde los 17 años de edad, tiene un puesto propio y labora en el de lunes a sábado sin un horario fijo.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su yerno. Este crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ollas. 

Su sueño es viajar a los Estados Unidos.
texts.en:
The “Guardianes de la Fé” comunal bank is made up of 4 women and 4 men who live in different areas of the city of Cuenca. This city is known as the Santa Ana of the Four Rivers; this name comes from the four rivers that flow through it. This city is very cultured and has a great variety of food. It’s people are friendly and charismatic, as are our members, who work in different businesses that allow them to contribute economically to their households and help their families get ahead.

One of the members of the group is Blanca, who lives near the city of Cuenca. She is 45 years old, married, and has 5 children. Three of them are married and independent. Her 19 year-old son is doing his military service and then he will go to university. Her 6 year-old son is studying in a school in the city. Her husband works as a bread maker in his own store. They do not have their own house so they rent.

Blanca sells food. She has been doing this work since she was 17 years old. She has her own place and works from Monday to Saturday without a set schedule.

This is her first loan with the communal bank, which she was invited to join by her son-in-law. She will use this loan to buy cooking pots.

Her dream is to travel to the United States.

loans.use: to buy cooking pots

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: Soledad tiene 36 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Vende frutas en un mercadillo de su localidad desde hace 2 años, es así que atiende todas las mañanas hasta la tarde y al finalizar tiene se encarga de la cuentas de las ganancias del día. Pero su día de trabajo empieza cuando debe comprar la mercadería, tanto vegetales y frutas frescas en el mercado mayorista y esto es en la madrugada para luego llevarlo a su puesto de trabajo. Para María este negocio le resulta rentable porque siempre hay personas que compran sus productos. Su mayor anhelo es tener una tienda en su casa, pero le es muy necesario arreglar la infraestructura de su hogar. Es la segunda vez que esta solicitando un crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar sus metas financieras. En esta ocasión el dinero estará destinado al mejoramiento de la infraestructura de su casa, en la colocación de puertas metálicas que falta instalar en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Soledad, age 36, lives with her three children in her own house.  She has been selling fruit at a street marked in her town for two years.  She attends to her business every morning until the afternoon.  To wrap up she has to deal with the accounts of the day’s earnings.  

Her work day begins when she needs to buy the merchandise.  She buys as many vegetables as fresh fruit in the wholesale market.  This is at daybreak in order to then take them to her work place.  This business has been very profitable for María because there are always people who buy her products.

Her greatest desire is to have a store in her house.  But, she really needs to fix up the infrastruction of her house.

This is the second time that she has asked for a loan from MFP.  She hopes to have the support of each one of you in order to make her financial goals a reality.  This time the money will be used for the improvement of the infrastructure of her house.  Metal doors that are lacking will be installed at her house.

loans.use: to buy metal doors for her house.

loans.name: Alis

texts.es: Alis tiene 37 años, es una mujer responsable y muy trabajadora, convive con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos de 18, 11 y 04 años. Juntos viven en su casa que es propia. EL trabajo de Alis empieza muy temprano, pues ella trabaja en un centro de salud ejerciendo la carrera de enfermería. Al termino de su día laboral, vuelve a su casa a ver a sus hijos, y por las tardes sale en busca de clientes, ofreciendo ropa entre amigos, vecinos y familiares. Lleva haciendo este trabajo ya por cuatro años, anteriormente trabajaba en una posta, por lo que era su única fuente de ingreso. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que le da el tiempo para hacer las actividades de su casa y hacer otras cosas más. Vende muy buenos productos y eso hace que tengo buenos clientes y genere buenos ingresos, espera poder mantenerse así y con el tiempo instalar una pequeña tienda en su casa. Este será el tercer préstamo que tiene, por tanto espera nuevamente el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ropa para seguir con el negocio de venta de prendas, además de invertir en algunos accesorios para poder mostrar mejor sus prendas.
texts.en:
Alis, age 37, is a responsible and hardworking woman. She lives with her partner and their three chidlren (ages 18, 11, and 4) in their own home. Her work begins very early at a health clinic where she has a job as a nurse. After her work day is finished, she returns home to see her children. In the evenings she goes out in search of customers, offering clothes to friends, neighbors, and relatives. Alis has been in this business for four years. She previously worked at an emergency center as her only source of income. What she enjoys most about her work is that it gives her time to perform the household activities and do many other things. She sells outstanding products, which helps her to obtain good customers and generate a nice income. Alis hopes to maintain her business and eventually open a small store in her home.

This will be her third loan. Alis hopes to receive everyone’s support. The amount she requested will be used to buy merchandise so that she can continue her clothing business. In addition, she will also invest in a few accessories that look good with the clothes.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and accessories.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is 42 years of age and married. The couple have been blessed with five children. Nowadays, three of her children are still school-aged while two are already married. 

Marivic has been operating her charcoal sales for one year and she is able to earn P2,000 a month. She uses her income for their daily needs, allowances of children and payment of electric bills. She would like to improve her business so that she can send her children to college level of education.

In this regard, she is aiming to buy charcoal for her retail business but due to insufficient funds she is requesting a loan in the amount of P8,000. This amount would really help her to improve the business she manages. So she is hoping that she can maintain her business to be able to give her family a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy charcoal for retail business.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos tiene 53 años, es un hombre muy bueno y responsable, onvive con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos, que ya son mayores e independientes. Él vive en el fundo de su jefe ya que trabaja cuidanlo, y del cual también hae uso de los terrenos para cultivar y criar animales. El trabajo de Calos consiste en la siembra y cosecha de cítricos y algunos productos regionales como yuca, plátano, ají; además cría animales como gallinas, patos, pollo, vacas y más. Este trabajo lo hace en la chacra de su patrón, pues el trabajo que realiza cuidandolo a cambio le pagan para que aproveche y se beneficie del espacio. Él trabaja solo y cuando es necesario contrata peones para poder ayudarlo en la siembra. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que esta siempre en la naturaleza, además que tiene tiempo libre para muchas actividades. Espera poder mantenerse con su producción y comprar mas adelante su propio fundo en donde pueda él mismo trabajar y sembrar y criar. Este será el préstamo número cinco con la institución MFP, siempre fue muy responsable y espera poder seguir siéndolo, además está muy agradecido pues le dieron la oportunidad de crecer. Con el monto solicitado, comprará granos y algunos palos de yuca, además contratará jornaleros para que le ayuden en el siembra.
texts.en:
Carlos, age 53, is a good and responsible man. He lives with his partner and they have three children who are grown and independent. Carlos lives on an estate where he is the foreman in charge of taking care of the grounds. He also has use of the land for farming and raising animals. His work consists of growing and harvesting citrus fruits and a few regional products such as cassava, bananas, and chili peppers. Carlos also raises animals such as hens, ducks, chickens, cows, and other livestock. This work is performed on the farm of his employer. He is able to take advantage of the benefits of this space in exchange for taking care of the premises. What he enjoys most about his work is always being around nature. In addition, he has free time to devote to other activities. Carlos hopes to maintain his production and buy his own farm in the future where he can plant crops and raise animals.

This will be his fifth loan with MFP. Carlos has always been responsible and hopes to continue in the same manner. In addition, he is very grateful for being given the opportunity to grow. The amount he requested will be used to buy seeds and some cassava shoots. He will also hire workers to help with the planting.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and cassava shoots and to hire workers to help with the planting.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 45 years old and married with two children in school.

Rosalina has been engaged in buying and selling charcoal for two years and she's thankful because it's the main source of income of her family. She works very hard to provide them a good quality of life. According to her, she would like to ask for additional capital in the amount of P8,000 to purchase charcoal, two piglets, and feed for her charcoals sales and hog-raising businesses. 

She hopes that she can improve her business to save money and secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy charcoal, two piglets, and feed.

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is married with two little kids. She is 29 years old and lives in Capucao, Ozamiz City, Philippines.

Sharon is a farmer and grows edible plants like cassava, root crops, legumes and others, to earn a living. She has been tilling her land for over 10 years; hard work, but Sharon loves her work. Each month, she approximately makes a total of PHP 6,000 from this and along with other irregular sources of income. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to purchase fertilizers for the fast and firm growth of the plants. 

Sharon joined the cooperative earlier this year. This is the initial loan amount taken from GDMPC. In the future, Sharon hopes to expand her business and plant more crop varieties to earn more income and sustain daily needs of the family. She also plans to improve her house so as to have a comfortable place to live in.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Danitza

texts.es: Danitza tiene 25 años, es una mujer muy alegre y emprendedora, convive con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 7 y 5 años. Juntos viven en su casa que es propia. Su mayor anhleo es darles una buena educación a sus hijos y una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Danitza consiste en la venta de golosinas, es así que se va muy temprano a un instituto superior de su localidad en donde tiene un pequeño puesto de golosinas, ahí los alumnos y docentes son sus clientes fieles. Tiene un año trabajando en esto y lo hace sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede estar en actividad todo el tiempo, ya que los alumnos no le dejan de comprar en ningún momento, además de su trato es muy bueno con ellos y eso le da más ventaja. Espera en adelante poner una tienda en su casa y continuar vendiendo golosinas entre productos de primera necesidad. Este será el segundo préstamo que tiene y espera contar nuevamente con su ayuda para continaur trabajando. Con el monto solicitado, comprará golosinas y algunos otros productos para seguir con su venta e intentar agrandar su negocio.
texts.en:
Danitza, age 25, is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her partner and their two children, ages 7 and 5. Her greatest wish is to provide her children with a good education and a better quality of life. Danitza’s work involves selling candy. She leaves very early for a college in her town where she has a small candy stand. Her loyal customers consist of students and teachers. Danitza has been working by herself in this manner for one year. What she enjoys about her work is that it is an activity that happens all the time. There is never an occasion when students stop buying candy. In addition, she treats her customers very well, which gives her more of an advantage. She hopes that in the future she can open a store in her home and continue selling candy as well as basic necessity products.

This will be her second loan. Danitza hopes that she will have renewed support so that she can continue working. The amount she requested will be used to buy candy and other products so that she can continue selling and expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy candy and other products to sell.

loans.name: Anelor

texts.en:
Anelor is 36 years old and is married with six children. She has five children in school and works very hard to provide for them. For the past year, Anelor has run a sari-sari (retail) store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other grocery products.

Anelor is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy groceries to sell in her sari-sari store. In the future, she would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell in her sari-sari store

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is married with five grown children. She is 51 years old and lives in Capucao, Ozamiz City, Philippines.

Rebecca plants and harvests crops to earn a living. She has been working on the land for over 20 years and has enjoyed doing this kind of work. At the end of the month, she is able to earn a total of PHP 20,400 from this along with other income sources. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 at GDMPC to purchase fertilizers to improve plant growth. 

Rebecca joined GDMPC earlier this year. This is her first loan from the cooperative. In the future, Rebecca hopes to till additional land to grow more crops and increase the family income. She also plans to repair her house roofs and walls to live comfortably, especially during rainy days.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is married with 3 school-aged children. She is 29 years old and lives in Capucao, Ozamiz City. Philippines.

Sarah grows several edible plants such as root crops, cassava and other vegetables. She sells them in the marketplace, her own place and in neighboring communities. She has been cultivating the soil for over 10 years and gets a total of PHP 7,000 a month. She has requested a loan of PHP 5,000 from GDMPC to purchase seeds and seedlings to plant. 

Sarah became a member of GDMPC earlier this year. In the future, Sarah hopes to expand and improve her business to gain more income for the household. She plans to buy a house and a lot near her residence.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and seedlings.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is widow who has a business selling home products in the Philippines. She works hard to support her family and has run her business for the past seven years. 

Lilia  is requesting a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more home products to sell. She would like to save money for the future of her family and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy home products to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Raquil

texts.en:
Raquil is 31 years old and lives in Capucao, Ozamiz City, Philippines. She is married with 3 school-aged children. 

Raquil owns and operates a retail store at home. She sells mainly basics like laundry and bath soap, rice, rice bran, canned goods and spices. The business has existed for over two years and she earns approximately PHP 4,000 a month, including her husband's income. She has requested a loan of PHP 10,000 from GDMPC to invest in expanding her inventory.

Raquil has been a member of GDMPC for one year. This will be her second loan from the cooperative. In the future, Raquil hopes to expand and sustain business operations, and lay aside enough money for her children's education so that they have a brighter future.

loans.use: To invest in expanding her inventory.

loans.name: Dyna Rose

texts.en:
Dyna Rose is 35, married and lives with her three children who are of school-age. Her husband is a chainsaw operator while she manages her home-based store.

Dyna Rose has been selling groceries for one year. She sells all types of daily-use products such as milk, cooking oil, canned goods, eggs and soft drinks. With the profits she is able to cover all their household expenses.

To maintain her business, she is applying for a loan of P8,000 to buy more groceries such as sugar, bar soap, ingredients, soft drinks, snack foods and biscuits for her store. Her wish is for her business to grow and to have more products to offer her customers. She hopes that her loan request will be granted so that she will be able to improve her business and support her children in their studies.

loans.use: to buy stock for her sari-sari (variety) store

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 42 years old and is married with five children, four of whom are in school. Rosario works very hard to provide for her family. For the past six years, she has run a sari-sari (retail) store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as rice, sugar, soft-drinks, and other grocery products. 

Rosario is requesting a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her store. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es: Eulalia tiene 42 años, es una madre soltera que con esfuerzo, coraje y sacrificio pudo sacar adelante a sus tres hijos que ahora tienen 23, 20 y 15 años y viven junto a ella en su casa propia que pudo comprar con mucho esfuerzo. El trabajo de Eulalia consiste en la venta de comida, por las mañana ella vende desayunos y al medio día almuerzos y por las noches asados y comida. Ella realizará este trabajo sola y espera le vaya bien ya que es nueva en esta actividad, tiene un espacio acondicionado en su casa para poder tener todas las comodidades para su trabajo, tiene todas las ganas de salir adelante y crecer en su negocio. A ella le gusta mucho cocinar y estar en contacto con la gente y eso es un factor determinante para que gane a sus clientes. Espera poder trabajar bien y así generar muchas ganancias en su hogar, mas adelante quisiera ella tener su restaurante formal y así poder hacer empresa en su distrito. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, espera que los demás integrantes del grupo le ayuden a integrarse y a llevar el ritmo de trabajo que tienen y así no fallarles. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales como sillas, ingredientes e insumos para iniciar para la preparación de comida.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 42 years old and a single mother. With effort, courage, and sacrifice, she was able to move forward with her three children who are now 23, 20, and 15 years of age. They live together in their own home which she was able to buy after much effort. Her work involves selling food. Eulalia sells breakfast in the mornings, lunches at noon, and barbecue and dinners in the evenings. She goes about her work alone and hopes to do well since she is new to this business. Eulalia has a space in her house that is equipped with all of the amenities for her work so that she can succeed and grow in her business. She enjoys cooking and having contact with people, which is a determining factor that helps her to attract customers. Eulalia hopes to do good work and generate plenty of income for her household. Going forward, she wants to have a formal restaurant so that she can have a business in her district.

This will be her first loan with MFP. Eulalia hopes that the other members of her group will help her feel welcome and show her their work routine so that she does not disappoint them. The amount she requested will be used to buy materials such as chairs, ingredients, and supplies so that she can start preparing food.

loans.use: to purchase chairs, ingredients, and supplies for her food stall.

loans.name: Nemelyn

texts.en:
Nemelyn is 31 years old and is married with two children. With her children in school, Nemelyn works very hard to provide for them. For the past five years, she has run a variety store in the Philippines where she sells items such as soft-drinks, rice, canned goods, and other products. 

Nemelyn is requesting an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to sell

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 66 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. For the past 19 years, she has run a sari-sari (retail) store in the Philippines and she also earns an income from raising pigs. Lucy has borrowed and repaid 18 previous loans from NWTF.

Lucy is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more merchandise to sell. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to sell

loans.name: Camaria

texts.en:
Camaria is 52 years old and married with two children. With one child in school, Camaria works very hard to provide for them.

Camaria runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Camaria has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, milk, bread, sardines, etc.

In the future Camaria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her sari-sari (variety) store.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz tiene 55 años, es una mujer alegre, responsable y sobre todo muy trabajadora, ella esta casada y tiene junto a su esposo una casa propia en donde viven junto a su nieto a quien crían, educan y desean darle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Luz consiste en la siembra de granos de fréjol, maíz, camu camu, y otros productos más. Tiene sembríos de camu camu en su chacra cerca de su casa, además en otro distrito cerca de la ciudad, ella realiza su trabajo de forma directa junto a su esposo y su nieto. En época de siembra ella se encarga de contratar peones para que le ayuden a preparar la tierra, y en época de cosecha también, para que le ayuden en la recolección. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene mucho tiempo para poder hacer otras actividades, sin embargo cuando vende sus productos algunos mayoristas le quieren dar muy bajo precio por sus productos. Este será el crédito 16 con MFP, es socia fundadora y siempre se caracterizó por ser una buena pagadora y muy responsable, espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que esta muy agradecida de que le hayan dado la oportunidad de crecer junto a su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará granos como frejoles además de contratar peones para que le ayuden a arar la tierra antes de sembrar.
texts.en:
Luz is 55 years old. She is a woman who is cheerful, responsible, and most of all, hardworking. Luz is married and lives in her own home with her husband and a grandson that she is raising. She also wants to provide him with an education and a better quality of life. Her work involves planting beans, corn, “camu camu” (a berry native to the Amazon rainforest), and other products. The “camu camu” berries are grown on a farm near her home and on land located in another district near the city. Luz works alongside her husband and her grandson. During the planting season, she hires workers to help her with preparing the land. She hires them again during the harvest season to help with gathering produce. What she enjoys most about her work is that she has plenty of time to devote to other activities. However, when she sells her products, some of the wholesalers want to offer her a very low price.

This will be her 16th loan with MFP. Luz is a founding member and has always been known for having a good payment history and being very responsible. She hopes to continue working with her Communal Bank and is very grateful that she has been given the opportunity to grow in her work. The amount she requested will be used to buy seeds for planting beans. She will also hire workers to help plow the land before planting.

loans.use: to buy seeds for planting beans and to hire workers to plow the land.

loans.name: Leona

texts.en:
Leona is 49 years old and is a widow with four children.

Leona works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 28,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell.

Leona has borrowed and repaid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for a year and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Leona aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Norsia

texts.en:
Norsia works hard to support her family. Norsia is married and has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.

Norsia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle. She has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Norsia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for her motorcycle.

loans.name: Rosma

texts.en:
Rosma is 22 years old and married. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like sugar, groceries, etc. 

Rosma has borrowed and repaid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for six years and also earns an income from retailing charcoal.

Rosma aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional items to sell.

loans.name: Rica

texts.en:
Rica is 35 years old and married with four children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Rica has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for three years and also earns an additional income from ready-to-wear.

Rica aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To buy items to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 58 years old and married, with 10 children.  She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like shampoo, groceries, etc,. in her sari sari store.

Dominga has borrowed and repaid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 4 years and also earns an income from furniture making.  Dominga aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy items to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 33 years old and married, with one child. Josephine works very hard to provide for them. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Josephine has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items, such as sardines, spices, eggs, oils, noodles, etc.  In the future Josephine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell

loans.name: Hiizir

texts.en: Hiizir is 34 years old and lives with his three children and wife in a ger, a Mongolian yurt, in Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. His three children are high school students. His wife has been working at the Sansar local food market for four years. His family has been living in that particular place for 10 years. Hiizir operates a taxi service business. He started to drive a taxi 2 years ago. Now he wants to change his car with a new and better one. For this car exchange he needs additional money. He is a diligent and hard-working man who says, "I want to build my own house by next year so that I can live a comfortable life in a house." He is requesting a 1,500,000 MNT loan to buy a new car.

loans.use: To buy a new car

loans.name: Ganhuyag

texts.en: Ganhuyag is 49 years old and lives with his two children and wife in a ger—a Mongolian yurt—in Hovd province of Mongolia. His one son is a high school student and the other helps with the family business. Ganhuyag has been involved in repairing and servicing cars since 1996. He is one of the very few people who can fix car engines in their local town. He is a diligent and hard-working man and is also teaching his children how to fix cars. He is requesting a 1,300,000 MNT loan to buy spare parts of cars for his business.

loans.use: buy spare parts of cars

loans.name: Saparbek

texts.ru: Сапарбек  60-летний вдовец, живущий в с .Токтоян (северо-восточная часть Кыргызстана). С 1992 года семья Сапарбека успешно занимается перепродажей сельхоз продукции и скота. Благодаря доходам от своего бизнеса, Сапарбек смог дать хорошее образование своим детям. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Сапарбека насчитывается три лошади, четыре коровы и 25 овец. Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Сапарбек обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупа 4 бычков для откорма. Планируемую прибыль Сапарбек намерен использовать для реконструкции сарая  в целях обеспечения хороших условий для содержания скота.
texts.en: Suparbek is a 60-year-old widower, living in the Toktoyan village (north-eastern part of Kyrgyzstan).  Saparbek's family has been successfully involved in reselling agricultural products and livestock since 1992.  Thanks to the income from his business, Saparbek was able to provide his children with a good education.  Today, he owns three horses, four cows and twenty-five sheep.  To further increase his livestock headcount, Saparbek went to the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to request a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy buy four calves for fattening up.  Saparbek plans to use the expected profits to reconstruct a barn in order to provide good conditions for livestock keeping.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is married, with 3 children who are in school. She is 31 years old and is a very hard-working entrepreneur.  Rufina has a candle making business in the Philippines. 

Rufina requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials and ingredients for her candle business.  Rufina has been in this business for 12 years. In the future, Rufina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy materials and ingredients for her candle business

loans.name: Antonia

texts.en:
Antonia is 54 years old and married, with 9 children.  Antonia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items like softdrinks, groceries, etc. to sell in her store.

Antonia has borrowed and repaid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for five years and also earns an income from food vending.  Antonia aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase items like soft-drinks, groceries etc., to sell in her store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mekar Sandat Group

texts.en:
The Mekar Sandat group is a group of village women who all have piggeries. They have joined this group to get funding and training from MUK. 

Ni Made is married with one child still in elementary school. She is using part of the loan to buy four pigs that will be fattened for five months. The remainder of the loan will be used to buy pig feed. 

Ni Made wants to spend 5,000 rupees on her kitchen and 100,000 rupees to pay for electricity and water. Although her business is still small, Ni Made hopes it can support her children's education by paying for books and other school supplies in addition to kitchen tools.

loans.use: to buy four pigs

loans.name: Iris

texts.en:
Iris works hard to support her family. Iris is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Iris requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.  Iris has been in this business for 7 years.
She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mamlekat

texts.ru:
Компания «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» выражает искреннюю признательность всем социальным инвесторам Кива, кто поддержал Мамлекат в ее бизнесе посредством финансирования ее кредитов по линии Кива. 
Мамлекат родилась в городе Карабалта (Жайылский район, Кыргызская Республика). Вдова с 1987 года. Проживает с младшим сыном.
Мамлекат родилась в семье ветеринара и доярки. С раннего возраста помогала родителям по хозяйству и была самостоятельным ребенком. Вышла замуж в 1977 году в возрасте 20 лет. Жили с мужем в селе Степное (45 км к северу от города Карабалта) с его родителями. Через год у них рождается сын, Анвар. Муж тогда работал в колхозе «Серп и Молот» в городе Карабалта, туда и устроил Мамлекат дояркой. Со временем, они отделились от родителей и переехали в город Карабалта, купив небольшой домик недалеко от колхоза, в котором оба работали. В 1987 году у них рождается второй сын Ильдар. В этом же году, в связи с неизлечимой болезнью, у Мамлекат скоропостижно скончался муж. Она стойко пережила этот период, продолжая работать в колхозе дояркой, а так же содержала дома дойную корову, которую ей выделил колхоз в помощь. Сыновья росли, росли и потребности. Заработной платы на содержание семьи не хватало, и поэтому было решено завести свое хозяйство. В 1999 году Мамлекат продает свой дом в городе Карабалта и весь имеющийся на тот момент скот, а именно две дойных коровы и двух бычков, и покупает заброшенную кошару в 5 км от села Степное. Немного помогли родители Мамлекат с обустройством кошары, а так же с приобретением первых голов телят. Таким образом, в течении 10 лет, Мамлекат  занимается разведением крупнорогатого скота в собственной кошаре. На данный момент у Мамлекат в хозяйстве имеется 13 дойных коров, 25 бычков, 10 телят и 2 лошади, а так же несколько коз. Два года назад женила старшего сына, который в данное время проживает с семьей в доме ее родителей и ухаживает за стариками. 
Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Мамлекат обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS). На этот кредит она планирует закупить молодых бычков для откорма.  
Со временем, Мамлекат мечтает увеличить поголовье крупнорогатого скота, и помочь сыну купить дом в городе Карабалта.
texts.en: Company "Bai-Tushum and Partners" expresses a sincere appreciation to all social investors from Kiva, who supported Mamlekat in her business by financing her Kiva credit lines.  Mamlekat was born in the city of Karabalta (Jaiyl district, Kyrgyz Republic).  She has been a widow since 1987 and lives with her youngest son.  Mamlekat was born into a family of a veterinarian and a milkmaid.  Since young age, she had helped her parents with the household and was an independent child.  She got married in 1977 at the age of 20.  Her husband and she lived with his parents in the Stepnoe village (45 km north of Karabalta).  Their son Anvar was born one year later.  Mamlekat's husband worked at the "Hammer and Sickle" collective farm and helped Mamlekat get a job of a milkmaid there.  With time, they moved away from the parents and relocated to the city of Karabalta, where they bought a small house nearby a collective farm, where they both worked.  Their second son Ildar was born in 1987.  Also this same year, Mamlekat's husband passed away due an incurable sickness.  She steadfastly lived through this period, continued working as a milkmaid at the collective farm and also kept a dairy cow, given to her by the collective farm, at home.  Her sons grew and so did their needs.  Her salary was no longer enough to support the family, and this why she decided to start her own business.  in 1991, Mamlekat sold her house, all of the remaining livestock (two dairy cows and two bulls) in Karabalta and bought an abandoned shed 5 km away from the Stepnoe village.  Mamlekat's parents helped a little with fixing up the shed and also with buying first few calves.  This is how Mamlekat has been involved in breeding cattle in her own shed over the period of ten years.  Currently, Mamlekat has 13 dairy cows, 25 bulls, 10 calves and 2 horses, and also several goats.  She married off her son two years ago, and he now lives with his family in her parents' house and takes care of them.  In order to further increase her livestock quantity, Mamlekat requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  She plans to buy young bulls for fattening up.  With time, Mamlekat dreams of increasing her cattle headcount and helping her son to buy a house in Karabalta.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and tools for farming.

loans.name: Richelle

texts.en:
Richelle is married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Richelle is 31 years old and her three children are in school.

Richelle has a (palm leaves) nipa mat business in the Philippines. Richelle requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more palm leaves for her "nipa" making.

Richelle has been in this business for five years. Richelle would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more palm leaves for her "nipa" (palm frond mat) making.

loans.name: Erdenebat

texts.en:
Mr. Erdenebat, 35, is a transportation driver and lives with his two children and wife in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, in Kherlen town of Dornod, a province of Mongolia. He has been running a transportation business since 2001 and has gained a lot of experience. With the initial business earnings, he bought a small-sized land and a small, old house. But since past few years, his income has been declining due to fewer job orders.

Last summer, he started to rebuild his old house but couldn't finish due to lack of money to buy the building materials, specifically cement, bricks and iron-pipes. His previous house was very old and absolutely in unlivable condition. Erdenebat is trying to finish rebuilding his house before winter starts and hence is asking for a loan to purchase some building materials.

loans.use: purchase building materials to finish rebuilding his house

loans.name: Enkhbold

texts.en:
Mr. Enkhbold, 34, runs a transportation business through a mini truck. He lives with his two children and wife in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent, located in Kherlen town of Dornod, a province of Mongolia. He has been managing his business since 2007 and could buy a small sized land with his business earnings. Before starting his business, he used to work as a driver in the Mongolian Border Defense Force for many years but had to leave his job due to an illness. 

Now he is planning to boost his income by buying a new truck of a larger size than what currently he has. Having a new truck will benefit him business and help him improve his family's living conditions. Therefore he is requesting a loan to cover the payment for purchasing the new truck.

loans.use: cover the payment for purchasing a new truck.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase home furniture to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase inventory for his grocery store

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en: Gerald is 45 years old, married and father of four children (in the ages between one and seven) living in his own house in Hoima, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop for the past 12 years and acquired start-up capital for this business through farming. He faces a challenge of price fluctuations and debtors who don’t pay on time. Nonetheless he continues to dream of having his own wholesale shop. Gerald needs the loan to buy items like soap, sugar and salt for sale.

loans.use: to buy soap, salt and sugar for sale

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: Rashid is 44 years old, married and has seven children aged between 3 and 18 living in his own semi-permanent house in Hioma, Uganda. He owns a business of hides and skin and also trades in produce. He has been doing these businesses for 20 years and this has enabled him to buy land and a motorcycle. He hopes his business will improve in the future and will be able to generate more income. Rashid needs a loan to buy maize, hides and skin for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize, hides and skin for sale.

loans.name: Edward

texts.en: Edward is a thirty-year-old married man with two children. He owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. The responsibility of looking after the family is vested in him and his desire is to educate his children to university level. He has been a driver & a farmer for ten years. He used capital from farming to buy a taxi. His hardships are accidents and fuel price fluctuations. His vision is to buy a bus plus to have an educated family. Edward needs the loan to repair his taxi.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en: Harriet is 39 years old and is married with 3 children aged 3 to 8. She lives in her own house in Hoima, Uganda. She has been operating a motorcycle business for 6 years and this has facilitated payment of school fees for her children. Her major hardships include the failure of hired drivers to remit their weekly earnings on time and mechanical breakdown. Her dream is to own at least three motorcycles. Harriet wants the money to repair her motorcycle..

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle.

loans.name: Andranik

texts.ru:
Андраник родился 1964 году в деревне Хдранц, окончил Ехвардскую  сельскую среднюю школу. Андраник женат, у него трое детей: сыновья учатся в Капанской средней школе, дочь в прошлом году окончила Капанское медицинское училище и сейчас не работает. Жена Андраника также не работает.  
С 1994 года Андраник занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью в деревне Хдранц. Вместе с женой он разводит крупный рогатый скот, кур, овец, свиней, пчел, выращивает овощи на собственном огороде. Также у Андраника есть небольшой участок земли, на котором он выращивает пшеницу и овес. Андраник реализует говядину, баранину, свинину, молоко, яйца, мед, шерсть и выращенные овощи своим постоянным клиентам в городе Капане. Благодаря сельскохозяйственной деятельности Андраник обеспечивает свою семью продовольственными товарами, а выручку от продажи сельхозпродукции использует для оставшихся нужд своей семьи. 
Кредит в размере 550.000 драм необходим Андранику для проведения посевных работ: покупки нового сорта зерна, дизельного топлива и удобрений.
texts.en: Andranik was born in 1964 in the Hdrants village and graduated from the Ehvardsk village school.  Andranik is married and has three children.  His sons attend the Kapan secondary school, daughter graduated from the Kapan medical college last year and is now unemployed.  Andranik's wife is also unemployed.  Andranik has been involved in an agricultural business in the Hdrants village since 1994.  Together with his wife, he keeps cattle, chickens, sheep, pigs and bees, and grows vegetables on his own land.  He also has a small plot of land, where he grows wheat and oats.  Andranik sells beef, lamb, pork, milk, eggs, honey, wool and vegetables to his loyal customers in the city of Kapan.  Thanks to the agricultural business, Andranik provides his family with food products and uses the profits from sales of agricultural products to support remaining needs of his family.  Andranik needs a loan in the sum of 550,000 dram to conduct sowing work, i.e. buy new types of seeds, diesel fuel and fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy new types of seeds, diesel fuel and fertilizers

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is 30 years old, married and has 5 children aged 2 to 10. He lives in his own house in Hioma, Uganda. He has been a fishmonger for 2 years. He faces the challenge of weather changes which adversely affect his business profits. His dream is to buy a refrigerator. Godfrey intends to use the loan to buy fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell..

loans.name: Ha's Group

texts.en:
Ha was born in 1978. She lives in Phan Xa village, uy No commune. She is married with two children who go to school. Her husband is a worker. He has an income of about 3,000,000 Vietnamdong(VND) per month. Mrs Ha has a store. She sells cobbler and breakfast (porridge). She has had this job for 5 years. She has a monthly income of about 5,000,000 VND. Since 2010, she has participated in SEDA. The last time she borrowed 6,322,000 VND and repaid this loan punctually. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 6,322,000 VND to expand her store by buying more chairs, tables and rice to cook porridge.

 About the other borrowers in her group:
 Lam is 36 years old. She has two children. She would like to borrow 6,322,000 VND for her small business.
 Thuy is 28 years old. She has two children. She would like to borrow 6,322,000 VND to repair her store.
 Chin is 42 years old. She has two children. She would like to borrow 6,758,000 VND to buy food for pigs.

loans.use: to expand her store  by buying more chairs, tables and rice to cook porridge.

loans.name: Willy

texts.en: Willy is 50 years old and is married with 6 children aged 9 to 23. He lives in his own house in Hioma, Uganda.The responsibility of looking after the family is vested in him and his desire is to see his children graduate. He is a teacher and has been teaching for 26 years. Willy needs the loan facility to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Hao

texts.en:
Hao was born in 1969. She lives in Phan Xa village, Uy No commune. She has two children who are going to school. Her husband is a worker. Her main job is farming. She grows rice and raises pigs. 

Since 2005 she has participated in SEDA and always repaid loans punctually. The last time, she borrowed 7,194,000 Vietnamese dong (VND). For this loan, she would like to borrow 8,398,000 VND to buy pigs.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 46 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Rosita is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosita has been raising pigs for two years and also earns an additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Thu's Group

texts.en:
Thu was born in 1982. She lives in Dai Bi village. She is married and has two sons who are small. Her husband is a driver. Mrs. Thu has a shop in the market. She sells dresses and other clothes. She has had this job for five years. Her family has a monthly income of about 7,000,000 VND. Since 2009, she has participated in SEDA and always repays loans punctually. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 7,630,000 VND to buy more clothes and dresses to resell.

About other borrowers in her group:
Mai is 52 years old. She has one child. She wants to borrow 7,630,000 VND to buy food for pigs.
Thao is 52 years old. She has three children. She wants to borrow 6,322,000 VND to breed pigs and poultry.
Trung is 26 years old. He has two children. He wants to borrow 7,630,000 VND to buy food for pigs.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and dresses to resell

loans.name: Media

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Media works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines and also earns an additional income from raising pigs. Media is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to  buy more fish to sell.

Media has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF.  She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 40 years old. She has two children. She has been in the transportation business for the past 10 years operating a minibus. This is her primary business that gives her a monthly income of 43,000 KES. The business is located in the busy Malindi town.

This is her first loan with KADET. She will use the loan to service her minibus. She will save the anticipated profits to help her invest in the future.

loans.use: To service her minibus

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 37-year-old married woman and has two children who are in school. She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Marilou requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Marilou has been raising pigs for 15 years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Marilou would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Nelma

texts.en:
Nelma is a 29 year-old married woman with 5 children.  Four of her children are currently in school.  Nelma is in the agricultural business of farming vegetables and rice in the Philippines.  Nelma requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Nelma has been farming vegetables for 13 years now and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.  In the future, Nelma would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru: Саодат проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж и сын находятся в России. Сама Саодат имеет среднее образование. Она у себя дома занимается животноводством. Разводит крупнорогатый скот в основном для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа коровы.
texts.en: Saodat lives in the Shahrituz district.  She is 49 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband and son are in Russia.  Saodat has a secondary education.  She is involved in animal husbandry at home and breeds cattle primarily for sale.  She has been in this business for seven years.  Saodat is requesting this loan for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: Для закупа коровы

loans.name: Rudella

texts.en:
Rudella is 50 years old and married, with three children.  Rudella works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell in her sari-sari store.

Rudella has borrowed and repaid 8 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from farming vegetables.  Rudella aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc., to sell in her  store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 54 years old and married, with three children.  She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Rosie is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rosie has been farming rice for 20 years and also earns an additional income from farming vegetables.  She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more livestock.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 55 years old and married, with 6 children.  Adelaida is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines.  Adelaida requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs and to repair her piggery cage.

Adelaida has been raising pigs for 3 years now and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.  Adelaida would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs and to repair her piggery cage

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy stock like tomatoes, onions, potatoes and to expand her business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia works hard to support her family. Alicia is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Alicia requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to customers.  Alicia has been in this business for 5 years.  In the future, Alicia would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers

loans.name: Casipher

texts.en: Casipher is 34 years old, married with 3 children aged 14-18. They live in a rented house in Hoima, Uganda. She has been operating a bar and lodge for 8 years. With the income generated, she has been able to pay school fees for her children. She faces the challenge of customers breaking bottles while drunk. Her dream is to operate a five-star hotel. Casipher needs the loan facility to buy beers and sodas for sale.

loans.use: to buy beers and sodas for sale

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 32 years old, married to Helen who is a business woman. They are blessed with one child aged two. James has been running a hotel for the past two years, generating a monthly income of KES 8,000 which he uses to support his family members. 


He is applying for his 4th loan term with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. He will use the loan to buy sugar, rice, wheat flour, and cooking oil for his hotel. Anticipated profits from the business will help him venture into dairy farming. His hopes are to educate his child and open a restaurant, while his wife concentrates on dairy farming to increase their income.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, wheat flour, and cooking oil for his hotel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 3 calves

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia is married, with 6 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Cynthia is 51 years old and has 2 children who are in school.

Cynthia has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. Cynthia requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like bedsheets, pants and blouses to sell to customers.  Cynthia has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Cynthia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like bedsheets, pants and blouses to sell to customers

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is from Iraq. He is 21 years old, married and lives with four family members of whom one works.

Ali has owned a store since 2008, selling construction and buildings materials. He has more than three years of experience and a good reputation, and he is well known in his area.

He decided to apply for a $2,400 loan in order to pay the annual rent for his store. He is aiming to gain more profits in order to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his store.

loans.name: Hamza

texts.en:
Hamza is from Iraq. He is 32 years old, married and has three children.

Hamza has owned a bakery since 2008. He makes and prepares all kind of pastries and bread. He has more than six years experience in this field and a good reputation. He is well known in his area. His store is situated in a crowded area so a number of potential customers pass by.

He decided to apply for a $2,400 loan in order to renovate and fix his bakery’s floor and walls. He is aiming to gain more profits in order to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to renovate and fix his bakery’s floor and walls.

loans.name: Elguja

texts.en:
Elguja is from the village of Partskhanakanebi, West Georgia. He is 53 years old and lives with his mother who is 79 years old.
